source_text: and terah took abram his son, and lot the son of haran his son's son, and sarai his daughter in law, his son abram's wife; and they went forth with them from ur of the chaldees, to go into the land of canaan; and they came unto haran, and dwelt there.
target_text: o tera sa kauti rau na luvena o eparama kei makubuna o loti na luvei arana, o na vugona o serai na wati eparama. e ratou sa lako tani mai kea, ka lako ki na vanua o kenani, ka e ratou sa mai tiko e arana.

source_text: and the days of terah were two hundred and five years: and terah died in haran.
target_text: na veisiga taucoko nei tera sa rua na drau ka lima na yabaki, ka sa mate mai arana o tera.

source_text: now the lord had said unto abram, get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and from thy father's house, unto a land that i will shew thee:
target_text: o jiova sa tukuna vei eparama: "mo lako tani mai na nomu vanua, mai vei ira na wekamu, mai na vale nei tamamu, ki na vanua au na vakaraitaka vei iko.

source_text: and i will make of thee a great nation, and i will bless thee, and make thy name great; and thou shalt be a blessing:
target_text: "au na cakava mo matanitu levu; o iko talega na veivakalouvinakataki.

source_text: and i will bless them that bless thee, and curse him that curseth thee: and in thee shall all families of the earth be blessed.
target_text: "au na vakalouvinakataki ira sa vakalouvinakataki iko, au na rukaki ira sa rukaki iko; mai vei iko na veivuvale kecega e vuravura era na vakalouvinakataki. "

source_text: so abram departed, as the lord had spoken unto him; and lot went with him: and abram was seventy and five years old when he departed out of haran.
target_text: sa lako o eparama me vaka sa vosa kina vua o jiova, sa lako vata kei koya o loti. sa yabaki vitusagavulu ka lima o eparama ni sa lako tani mai arana.

source_text: and abram took sarai his wife, and lot his brother's son, and all their substance that they had gathered, and the souls that they had gotten in haran; and they went forth to go into the land of canaan; and into the land of canaan they came.
target_text: sa kauti serai o eparama kei loti na luvei tacina kei na veika kece e taukena era sa soqona mai kei ira na tamata era sa nona mai arana. era sa lako ki na vanua o kenani. era sa yaco mai kenani.

source_text: and abram passed through the land unto the place of sichem, unto the plain of moreh. and the canaanite was then in the land.
target_text: sa lako curuma mai na vanua o eparama me yaco sara i sikemi ena vuni teribinici e more. era sa tiko ena vanua na kai kenani.

source_text: and the lord appeared unto abram, and said, unto thy seed will i give this land: and there builded he an altar unto the lord, who appeared unto him.
target_text: o jiova sa basika mai vei eparama ka tukuna vua, "ki vei ira na nomu kawa, au sa solia kina na vanua oqo. " sa tara mai kea o eparama e dua nai cabocabo ni soro vei jiova, o koya e a basika mai vua.

source_text: and he removed from thence unto a mountain on the east of bethel, and pitched his tent, having bethel on the west, and hai on the east: and there he builded an altar unto the lord, and called upon the name of the lord.
target_text: sa lako mai kea ki na veiulunivanua ena tokalau kei peceli, sa vakaduria mai kea na nona vale-laca, e peceli ena ra kei ai ena tokalau; mai kea sa tara kina e dua nai cabocabo ni soro ka kaciva na yaca i jiova.

source_text: and abram journeyed, going on still toward the south.
target_text: sa lako tikoga o eparama, ka lako vakadodonu tikoga ki na ceva.

source_text: and there was a famine in the land: and abram went down into egypt to sojourn there; for the famine was grievous in the land.
target_text: sa dua na lauqa levu sa yaco ena vanua, o eparama sa lako sobu ki ijipita me la'ki tiko kina ni sa rui levu na lauqa ena vanua.

source_text: and it came to pass, when he was come near to enter into egypt, that he said unto sarai his wife, behold now, i know that thou art a fair woman to look upon:
target_text: sa qai yaco ni sa voleka yani ki ijipita, sa tukuna vei serai na watina, "raica, au sa kila ni o sa rui yalewa rairai totoka.

source_text: therefore it shall come to pass, when the egyptians shall see thee, that they shall say, this is his wife: and they will kill me, but they will save thee alive.
target_text: "ena yaco ni ra sa raici iko na ijipita, era na tukuna ka vaka, 'oqo na watina, ' era na qai vakamatei au ka mo bula ga o iko.

source_text: say, i pray thee, thou art my sister: that it may be well with me for thy sake; and my soul shall live because of thee.
target_text: "au kerea mo tukuna ni o iko na ganequ, me vinaka kina vei au ena vukumu, me'u bula kina baleti iko. "

source_text: and it came to pass, that, when abram was come into egypt, the egyptians beheld the woman that she was very fair.
target_text: sa vaka kina ni sa yaco yani ki ijipita o eparama, era sa raica na yalewa na kai ijipita ni sa rui totoka dina.

source_text: the princes also of pharaoh saw her, and commended her before pharaoh: and the woman was taken into pharaoh's house.
target_text: o ira na sauturaga nei fero era sa raici serai talega ka vakatututaki koya sara vei fero. sa mai kau sara yani na yalewa oqo ki na vale nei fero.

source_text: and he entreated abram well for her sake: and he had sheep, and oxen, and he asses, and menservants, and maidservants, and she asses, and camels.
target_text: sa qaravi vinaka o eparama ena vuku ni yalewa. sa tu talega na nona sipi, na bulumakau, na asa tagane, o ira na nona dauveiqaravi tagane kei na yalewa kei na kameli.

source_text: and the lord plagued pharaoh and his house with great plagues because of sarai abram's wife.
target_text: o jiova, sa vakatubura vei fero kei na nona vuvale ena mate ca levu baleti serai na wati eparama.

source_text: and pharaoh called abram, and said, what is this that thou hast done unto me? why didst thou not tell me that she was thy wife?
target_text: sa kacivi eparama mai o fero ka taroga, "na cava o sa cakava oqo vei au? na cava o sega ni tukuna kina vei au ni o koya e watimu?

source_text: why saidst thou, she is my sister? so i might have taken her to me to wife: now therefore behold thy wife, take her, and go thy way.
target_text: "na cava o tukuna kina ni 'o koya na ganemu? voleka sara ni'u kauti koya me watiqu. oqo, tauri koya yani ka lako ena nomu i lakolako. "

source_text: and pharaoh commanded his men concerning him: and they sent him away, and his wife, and all that he had.
target_text: sa solia nai vakaro o fero me baleti koya, era sa vakatalai koya yani kei serai na watina kei na ka kecega e nona.

source_text: and abram went up out of egypt, he, and his wife, and all that he had, and lot with him, into the south.
target_text: sa lako tani mai ijipita o eparama, kei watina kei na veika kece e nona, kei loti, mai na ceva.

source_text: and abram was very rich in cattle, in silver, and in gold.
target_text: sa vutuniyau sara o eparama ena manumanu susu, ena siliva kei na koula.

source_text: and he went on his journeys from the south even to bethel, unto the place where his tent had been at the beginning, between bethel and hai;
target_text: sa lako yani ena nona i lakolako mai na ceva me yaco sara ki peceli â€œsa yaco sara yani ena vanua ea tiko kina e liu, o ya ena kedrau maliwa o peceli kei ai,

source_text: unto the place of the altar, which he had made there at the first: and there abram called on the name of the lord.
target_text: ki na vanua e a cakava kina nai cabocabo ni soro. e kea sa kaciva kina o eparama na yaca i jiova.

source_text: and lot also, which went with abram, had flocks, and herds, and tents.
target_text: o loti talega â€œni rau a lako vata kei eparama, sa levu sara na nona manumanu susu kei na nona bulumakau kei na nona veivale laca.

source_text: and the land was not able to bear them, that they might dwell together: for their substance was great, so that they could not dwell together.
target_text: sa sega ni levu na vanua me rau tiko kina, baleta ni sa rui levu na veika e rau taukena.

source_text: and there was a strife between the herdmen of abram's cattle and the herdmen of lot's cattle: and the canaaniteand the perizzite dwelled then in the land.
target_text: era sa veiqati talega na dauqaravi ira na nodrau manumanu, na nei eparama kei na nei loti. o ira na kai kenani kei ira na perisaiti era sa tiko ena vanua.

source_text: and abram said unto lot, let there be no strife, i pray thee, between me and thee, and between my herdmen and thy herdmen; for we be brethren.
target_text: sa tukuna o eparama vei loti, "raica, me daru kua ni veiqati, se o ira na nodaru dauqaravi manumanu, ni da sa veiwekani voleka.

source_text: is not the whole land before thee? separate thyself, i pray thee, from me: if thou wilt take the left hand, then i will go to the right; or if thou depart to the right hand, then i will go to the left.
target_text: "sa sega beka ni tu oqori e matamu na vanua taucoko? au kerea, me daru sa tawase, kevaka o sa lako ki nai mawi, au na lako ki nai matau, se o lako ki nai matau, au na lako ki nai mawi. "

source_text: and lot lifted up his eyes, and beheld all the plain of jordan, that it was well watered every where, before the lord destroyed sodom and gomorrah, even as the garden of the lord, like the land of egypt, as thou comest unto zoar.
target_text: sa rai cake o loti ka raica na buca ena joritani, ni sa tu na wai e na veiyasana kecega (oqo ni se bera ni vakarusai kina o sotoma kei komora) ka sa vaka na were nei jiova, sa vaka na vanua mai ijipita ni o lako yani vaka ki soa.

source_text: then lot chose him all the plain of jordan; and lot journeyed east: and they separated themselves the one from the other.
target_text: sa digitaka o loti na buca ni joritani â€œsa lako ki na tokalau o loti. e rau sa veitawasei.

source_text: abram dwelled in the land of canaan, and lot dwelled in the cities of the plain, and pitched his tent toward sodom.
target_text: sa tiko e kenani o eparama, ka sa tiko ena veikoro mai na buca o loti, sa la'ki birika sara na nona vale-laca e sotoma.

source_text: but the men of sodom were wicked and sinners before the lord exceedingly.
target_text: o ira na tamata mai sotoma, era sa tamata i valavala vakasisila sara ka sinai e nai valavala ca vei jiova.

source_text: and the lord said unto abram, after that lot was separated from him, lift up now thine eyes, and look from the place where thou art northward, and southward, and eastward, and westward:
target_text: o jiova sa qai tukuna vei eparama ni sa lako tani mai vua o loti: "mo rai cake mai na vanua o sa tu kina oqori â€œki na vualiku â€œki na ceva â€œki na tokalau - ki na ra;

source_text: for all the land which thou seest, to thee will i give it, and to thy seed for ever.
target_text: "na vanua kece o sa raica oqori, au sa solia vei iko kei ira kece na nomu kawa me sega ni mudu.

source_text: and i will make thy seed as the dust of the earth: so that if a man can number the dust of the earth, then shall thy seed also be numbered.
target_text: "au na cakava vei ira na nomu kawa me ra vaka na kuvu ni soso e vuravura; kevaka e dua na tamata e wilika rawa na kuvu ni soso â€œena qai wiliki rawa na nomu kawa.

source_text: arise, walk through the land in the length of it and in the breadth of it; for i will give it unto thee.
target_text: "oqo mo tu cake, ka lakova na balavu kei na kena raraba ni vanua au sa solia vei iko. "

source_text: then abram removed his tent, and came and dwelt in the plain of mamre, which is in hebron, and built there an altar unto the lord.
target_text: sa tucake o eparama ka lobika na nona valelaca ka lako yani ka la'ki tiko ena vuniterebinici e mamire, oqori e epironi, sa tara maikea e dua nai cabocabo ni soro vei jiova.

source_text: and it came to pass in the days of amraphel king of shinar, arioch king of ellasar, chedorlaomer king of elam, and tidal king of nations;
target_text: sa qai yaco ena veisiga nei emarafeli na tui sina, arioki na tui elasa, jadorilaoma na tui ilama, kei tidala na tui ni veimatanitu,

source_text: that these made war with bera king of sodom, and with birsha king of gomorrah, shinab king of admah, and shemeber king of zeboiim, and the king of bela, which is zoar.
target_text: era sa vala kei bera na tui sotoma â€œbirisa na tui komora, o sinabe na tui atama, semeba na tui seboimi kei na tui bila (oqori o soa).

source_text: all these were joined together in the vale of siddim, which is the salt sea.
target_text: o ira kece oqo era sa mai sotasota ena buca mai sidimi (oqori na waitui masima).

source_text: twelve years they served chedorlaomer, and in the thirteenth year they rebelled.
target_text: e tinikarua na yabaki era sa qaravi jadorilaoma, ena i ka tinikatolu ni yabaki, era sa via veicoqa ka talaidredre.

source_text: and in the fourteenth year came chedorlaomer, and the kings that were with him, and smote the rephaims in ashteroth karnaim, and the zuzims in ham, and the emims in shaveh kiriathaim,
target_text: ena i katinikava ni yabaki, o jadorilaoma kei ira na tui era sa tiko vata era sa lako mai ka valuti refaimi e esitaroci karenaimi, o ira na susimi e ame, o ira na emimi e savei kiriacaimi,

source_text: and the horites in their mount seir, unto elparan, which is by the wilderness.
target_text: kei ira na oraite ena veiulunivanua e sairi, me yaco sara ki eli-perana o ya ena vanua liwa.

source_text: and they returned, and came to enmishpat, which is kadesh, and smote all the country of the amalekites, and also the amorites, that dwelt in hazezontamar.
target_text: era sa vuki lesu tale ka lako mai ki misifata (o ya o kadesi) ka valuti ira kece na amalekaiti kei ira na amoraiti, o ira sa vakaitikotiko e asesoni tamari.

source_text: and there went out the king of sodom, and the king of gomorrah, and the king of admah, and the king of zeboiim, and the king of bela (the same is zoar; ) and they joined battle with them in the vale of siddim;
target_text: na tui sotoma, na tui komora, na tui atama, na tui seboimi kei tui bela (oqori o soa) era sa lako yani ka duavata ena i valu mai na buca o sidimi

source_text: with chedorlaomer the king of elam, and with tidal king of nations, and amraphel king of shinar, and arioch king of ellasar; four kings with five.
target_text: me valuti jodarilaoma na tui ilama, tidala na tui ni veimatanitu, amarafaele na tui saina, kei arioki na tui elasa â€œe va na tui kei ira na lima na tui.

source_text: and the vale of siddim was full of slimepits; and the kings of sodom and gomorrah fled, and fell there; and they that remained fled to the mountain.
target_text: na buca mai sidimi sa sinai kina na qara dregadregata; o ira na tui ni sotoma kei komora era sa dui dro, eso era sa lutu ki na qara ka so era dro ki na veiulunivanua.

source_text: and they took all the goods of sodom and gomorrah, and all their victuals, and went their way.
target_text: era sa taura kece nai yaya vinaka mai sotoma kei komora kei na nodra i votavota ka era sa lako yani.

source_text: and they took lot, abram's brother's son, who dwelt in sodom, and his goods, and departed.
target_text: era sa kauti loti talega â€œna luvei taci eparama, o koya sa tiko mai sotoma, kei na veika kece e nona, ka lako.

source_text: and there came one that had escaped, and told abram the hebrew; for he dwelt in the plain of mamre the amorite, brother of eshcol, and brother of aner: and these were confederate with abram.
target_text: e dua vei ira sa dro mai, ka mai tukuna vei eparama na iperiu, ni sa tiko o koya mai mamire ena veivunikau e amoraiti, na taci esekoli, na taci ena, era sa duavata kei eparama.

source_text: and when abram heard that his brother was taken captive, he armed his trained servants, born in his own house, three hundred and eighteen, and pursued them unto dan.
target_text: ni sa rogoca o eparama, sa kau vakavesu na tacina, sa vakayaragitaki ira na tolu na drau tinikalima na nona dauveiqaravi sa vakavulici oti, o ira oqo, era sa sucu ga ena nona loma ni vale, era sa cici muri yani vaka ki tani.

source_text: and he divided himself against them, he and his servants, by night, and smote them, and pursued them unto hobah, which is on the left hand of damascus.
target_text: sa wasei ira na nona i valu ena bogi. o koya kei ira na nona tamata era cici muri ira na meca me yaco sara ki oba ena vualiku kei tamasiko.

source_text: and he brought back all the goods, and also brought again his brother lot, and his goods, and the women also, and the people.
target_text: sa kauta lesu mai na vei ka kece nei loti kei loti talega, o ira na yalewa kei ira kecega na tamata.

source_text: and the king of sodom went out to meet him after his return from the slaughter of chedorlaomer, and of the kings that were with him, at the valley of shaveh, which is the king's dale.
target_text: sa lako yani o tui sotoma me sotavi koya mai na buca o savei (oqori na tui ni buca) ena nona lesu mai ena nona vakadrukai o jadorilaoma kei ira na tui era sa tiko vata.

source_text: and melchizedek king of salem brought forth bread and wine: and he was the priest of the most high god.
target_text: o melekisateki na tui salemi sa kauta mai na madrai kei na waini. o koya oqo na bete nei koya na kalou cecere.

source_text: and he blessed him, and said, blessed be abram of the most high god, possessor of heaven and earth:
target_text: sa vosa vakalouvinakataki eparama ka vaka: "me kalouvinaka o eparama ni kalou cecere, na i taukei, ka lewa na lomalagi kei vuravura;

source_text: and blessed be the most high god, which hath delivered thine enemies into thy hand. and he gave him tithes of all.
target_text: me kalouvinaka talega na kalou sa cecere sara, o koya sa soli ira na kemu meca e ligamu. " sa solia vua o eparaama nai sigana (katini) kecega.

source_text: and the king of sodom said unto abram, give me the persons, and take the goods to thyself.
target_text: sa tukuna na tui sotoma vei eparama, "mo soli ira na tamata mai vei au ka kauta kece na veika sa tu oqori. "

source_text: and abram said to the king of sodom, i have lift up mine hand unto the lord, the most high god, the possessor of heaven and earth,
target_text: sa sauma yani o eparama vei tui sotoma, "au sa laveta oti na ligaqu vei jiova, na kalou cecere, nai taukei kei lomalagi kei vuravura,

source_text: that i will not take from a thread even to a shoelatchet, and that i will not take any thing that is thine, lest thou shouldest say, i have made abram rich:
target_text: "ni'u na sega ni kauta e dua na ka, mai nai vesu ni vava, au na sega ni kauta e dua na ka e nomu, de o na tukuna, 'au sa vaka vutuniyautaki eparama'â€

source_text: save only that which the young men have eaten, and the portion of the men which went with me, aner, eshcol, and mamre; let them take their portion.
target_text: "vakavo walega na veika era sa kania na cauravou, nai votavota ni tamata era sa lako vata kei au: o ana, o esikoli, kei mamire; me ratou kauta na nodratou i votavota. "

source_text: after these things the word of the lord came unto abram in a vision, saying, fear not, abram: i am thy shield, and thy exceeding great reward.
target_text: ni sa oti oqo, sa lako mai na vosa i jiova vei eparama ena raivotu ka tukuna, "mo kua ni rere eparama, oi au na nomu i sasabai, kei na nomu i votavota e levu sara. "

source_text: and abram said, lord god, what wilt thou give me, seeing i go childless, and the steward of my house is this eliezer of damascus?
target_text: sa tukuna mai o eparama, "i jiova na noqu kalou, na cava o ni na solia vei au, sa sega na luvequ, na kawa ga ni noqu o iliesa na kai tamasiko? "

source_text: and abram said, behold, to me thou hast given no seed: and, lo, one born in my house is mine heir.
target_text: sa tukuna tale o eparama, "raica o ni sa sega ni solia vei au na kawa: me dua ga e sucu e noqu vale me noqu kawa! "

source_text: and, behold, the word of the lord came unto him, saying, this shall not be thine heir; but he that shall come forth out of thine own bowels shall be thine heir.
target_text: sa qai lako tale mai vua na vosa i jiova ka vaka: "o iliesa ena sega ni nomu kawa, e dua ga ena lako mai ena yagomu dina ena wili me nomu kawa. "

source_text: and he brought him forth abroad, and said, look now toward heaven, and tell the stars, if thou be able to number them: and he said unto him, so shall thy seed be.
target_text: o jiova sa qai kauti koya i tuba ka tukuna, "mo rai mada i lomalagi ka wilika mada na veikalokalo, kevaka e rawa ni o wilika ira, " sa tukuna tale vua, "era na vaka oqori na nomu kawa. "

source_text: and he believed in the lord; and he counted it to him for righteousness.
target_text: sa vakabauti jiova o eparama, na kalou sa wiliki eparama me yalododonu.

source_text: and he said unto him, i am the lord that brought thee out of ur of the chaldees, to give thee this land to inherit it.
target_text: na kalou sa vosa vei eparama ka vaka, "oi au o jiova, o koya sa kauti iko mai uri e kalitia, me'u solia vei iko na vanua oqo mo taukena. "

source_text: and he said, lord god, whereby shall i know that i shall inherit it?
target_text: sa sauma yani o eparama, "i jiova na kalou me'u kila vakacava ni'u na taukena? "

source_text: and he said unto him, take me an heifer of three years old, and a she goat of three years old, and a ram of three years old, and a turtledove, and a young pigeon.
target_text: na kalou sa sauma vei eparama, "kauta mai vei au e dua na luve ni bulumakau yabaki tolu, e dua na me yalewa yabaki tolu, e dua na luve ni sipi yabaki tolu, e dua na ruve dina kei na dua na ruve kawa vata. "

source_text: and he took unto him all these, and divided them in the midst, and laid each piece one against another: but the birds divided he not.
target_text: sa kauta kece mai oqo o eparama vei jiova musuka wase rua na manumanu kece ka sega ga na ruve e rua oqo.

source_text: and when the fowls came down upon the carcases, abram drove them away.
target_text: ni ra sa vuka sobu mai na tuivucilevu me ra mai kana, sa cemuri ira tikoga o eparama.

source_text: and when the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell upon abram; and, lo, an horror of great darkness fell upon him.
target_text: ni sa dromu sobu na siga, sa tarai eparama e dua na via moce levu, sa yaco mai vua e dua na rere kei na butobuto levu.

source_text: and he said unto abram, know of a surety that thy seed shall be a stranger in a land that is not theirs, and shall serve them; and they shall afflict them four hundred years;
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna vei eparama, "mo kila oqo â€œni o ira na nomu kawa era na vulagi ena vanua oqo, o koya sa sega ni nodra, era na qaravi ira, era na vakararawataki kemuni me va na drau na yabaki.

source_text: and also that nation, whom they shall serve, will i judge: and afterward shall they come out with great substance.
target_text: "na matanitu talega era na qarava, au na veilewaitaki ira â€œni oti o ya era na qai sereki mai kei na veika era na taukena, ena levu sara.

source_text: and thou shalt go to thy fathers in peace; thou shalt be buried in a good old age.
target_text: "o iko, o na lako vei ira na tamamu ena vakacegu. o na buluti ni o sa qase vinaka sara.

source_text: but in the fourth generation they shall come hither again: for the iniquity of the amorites is not yet full.
target_text: "ena i kava ni tabatamata, era na qai lesu tale mai eke, baleta na nodra talaidredre vakasisila na amoraiti e se bera ni taucoko. "

source_text: and it came to pass, that, when the sun went down, and it was dark, behold a smoking furnace, and a burning lamp that passed between those pieces.
target_text: sa oti oqo, sa qai dromu na matanisiga, sa butobuto sara, sa dua na lovo sa kuvu tiko, kei na yameyame sa caudre tiko, sa lako voli ena kedra maliwa na lewe ni manumanu.

source_text: in the same day the lord made a covenant with abram, saying, unto thy seed have i given this land, from the river of egypt unto the great river, the river euphrates:
target_text: ena siga vata ga o ya, sa cakava kina e dua na veiyalayalati o jiova kei eparama ka vaka: "kivei ira na nomu kawa au sa solia kina na vanua oqo, mai na uciwai mai ijipita ki na uciwai levu na uferetisiâ€

source_text: the kenites, and the kenizzites, and the kadmonites,
target_text: "na kenaiti, na kenaseraiti kei na kadomonaiti,

source_text: and the hittites, and the perizzites, and the rephaims,
target_text: "na itaiti, na perisaiti kei na refaimi,

source_text: and the amorites, and the canaanites, and the girgashites, and the jebusites.
target_text: "na amoraiti, na kenaninaiti, na qeviqasaiti kei na jepusaiti. "

source_text: now sarai abram's wife bare him no children: and she had an handmaid, an egyptian, whose name was hagar.
target_text: o serai na wati eparama, e se sega tikoga ni vakasucuma e dua na gone. sa tiko vei koya e dua na yalewa dauveiqaravi ni ijipita, na yacana o eka.

source_text: and sarai said unto abram, behold now, the lord hath restrained me from bearing: i pray thee, go in unto my maid; it may be that i may obtain children by her. and abram hearkened to the voice of sarai.
target_text: sa tukuna o serai vei eparama, "raica o jiova sa tarovi au me'u vakaluveni, au kerea mo curumi koya na noqu dauveiqaravi, me dua kina na noqu gone mai vua. " sa vakaio sara ga o eparama ki na vosa nei serai.

source_text: and sarai abram's wife took hagar her maid the egyptian, after abram had dwelt ten years in the land of canaan, and gave her to her husband abram to be his wife.
target_text: o serai na wati eparama sa kauti eka mai ka solia vei eparama me rau veiwatini, oqo ni sa oti e tini na yabaki ena nona tiko e kenani o eparama.

source_text: and he went in unto hagar, and she conceived: and when she saw that she had conceived, her mistress was despised in her eyes.
target_text: sa curumi eka o eparama, ka sa kunekune sara o eka, sa mani dokadoka kina na matana.

source_text: and sarai said unto abram, my wrong be upon thee: i have given my maid into thy bosom; and when she saw that she had conceived, i was despised in her eyes: the lord judge between me and thee.
target_text: sa tukuna o serai vei eparama, "sa baleti au ga na noqu cala, baleta ni'u soli eka ki lomaseremu, ni sa kila o koya ni sa kunekune tiko, sa beci au vakalevu na matana. me qai lewa o jiova ena vukudaru. "

source_text: but abram said unto sarai, behold, thy maid is in thy hand; do to her as it pleaseth thee. and when sarai dealt hardly with her, she fled from her face.
target_text: sa tukuna o eparama vei serai, "sa tikoga e ligamu na nomu vada; mo cakava vua na veika ga o vinakata. " ni sa cakacaka vakaukauwa vua o serai, sa qai yaco me sa dro yani na nona vada, mai vua.

source_text: and the angel of the lord found her by a fountain of water in the wilderness, by the fountain in the way to shur.
target_text: na agilosi i jiova sa raici eka ena dua na mata ni wai ena vanua liwa, oqo, ena sala vaka ki suri.

source_text: and he said, hagar, sarai's maid, whence camest thou? and whither wilt thou go? and she said, i flee from the face of my mistress sarai.
target_text: sa tukuna sara, "i eka na dauveiqaravi nei serai, o lako tu mai vei, o lako tiko i vei? " sa sauma mai, "au sa dro tiko mai vua na noqu marama o serai. "

source_text: and the angel of the lord said unto her, return to thy mistress, and submit thyself under her hands.
target_text: na agilosi i jiova sa tukuna vua, "mo lesu tale vua na nomu marama ka vakamalumalumutaki iko e ligana. "

source_text: and the angel of the lord said unto her, i will multiply thy seed exceedingly, that it shall not be numbered for multitude.
target_text: na agilosi i jiova sa tukuna vua, "au na vakalewevuqataka na nomu kawa me ra na sega ni wili rawa. "

source_text: and the angel of the lord said unto her, behold, thou art with child, and shalt bear a son, and shalt call his name ishmael; because the lord hath heard thy affliction.
target_text: na agilosi i jiova sa tukuna tale vua, "raica, o sa tiko vata kei na gone, o na vakasucuma e dua na gone tagane, mo vakayacani koya o isimeli, baleta ni sa rogoca na nomu vakararawataki o jiova.

source_text: and he will be a wild man; his hand will be against every man, and every man's hand against him; and he shall dwell in the presence of all his brethren.
target_text: ena tamata kila o koya, na ligana ena veivala kei ira na tamata kecega, kei na ligadra na tamata kecega era na veivala kei na ligana. ena tiko o koya e matadra na tacina. "

source_text: and she called the name of the lord that spake unto her, thou god seest me: for she said, have i also here looked after him that seeth me?
target_text: sa qai masuta na yacai jiova, o koya sa vosa vua, sai-kemuni-na-kalou-sa-rai tiko ni sa tukuna, "au sa raici koya beka, o koya sa raici au talega? "

source_text: wherefore the well was called beerlahairoi; behold, it is between kadesh and bered.
target_text: sa vakayacani na mataniwai o ya me bea-laeiroi, oqo ena kedrau maliwa o ketesa kei bereti.

source_text: and hagar bare abram a son: and abram called his son's name, which hagar bare, ishmael.
target_text: o eka sa vakasucuma vei eparama e dua na gone tagane, na gone sa vakasucuma oqo o eka, sa vakayacani koya o eparama me o isimeli.

source_text: and abram was fourscore and six years old, when hagar bare ishmael to abram.
target_text: sa yabaki walusagavulu ka ono o eparama ni sa vakasucuma vua o eka, na gonetagane sa vakayacani o isimeli.

source_text: and when abram was ninety years old and nine, the lord appeared to abram, and said unto him, i am the almighty god; walk before me, and be thou perfect.
target_text: ena gauna sa yabaki ciwasagavulu ka ciwa sa basika vua o jiova ka tukuna vua, "oi au na kalou kaukauwa, mo lako vakadodonu e mataqu ka mo kakua ni cala.

source_text: and i will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.
target_text: "au na cakava na noqu veiyalayalati, o au kei iko, au na vakalevutaka sara na nomu kawa. "

source_text: and abram fell on his face: and god talked with him, saying,
target_text: sa cuva vakatoboicu o eparama, ka rau sa veivosaki kei na kalou ka vaka:

source_text: as for me, behold, my covenant is with thee, and thou shalt be a father of many nations.
target_text: "mai vei au, raica, na noqu veiyalayalati sa tiko vata kei iko, o na tamadra na veimatanitu.

source_text: neither shall thy name any more be called abram, but thy name shall be abraham; for a father of many nations have i made thee.
target_text: "ena sega ni yacamu tiko o eparama, oqo sa yacamu o eparaama, ni'u sa vakavuna vei iko mo tamadra na veimatanitu.

source_text: and i will make thee exceeding fruitful, and i will make nations of thee, and kings shall come out of thee.
target_text: "au na vakayacora vei iko mo vuavuai; au na vakatubura mai vei iko na veimatanitu, era na tubu mai vei iko na tui.

source_text: and i will establish my covenant between me and thee and thy seed after thee in their generations for an everlasting covenant, to be a god unto thee, and to thy seed after thee.
target_text: "au na vakadeitaka na noqu veiyalayalati ena kedaru maliwa kei ira na nomu kawa era na muri mai, ena nodra dui tabatamata, me veiyalayalati e sega ni mudu, me kalou vei iko kei ira kecega era na muri mai vei iko.

source_text: and i will give unto thee, and to thy seed after thee, the land wherein thou art a stranger, all the land of canaan, for an everlasting possession; and i will be their god.
target_text: "au sa solia talega vei iko kei ira na nomu kawa era na muri mai na vanua oqo dou sa tiko vulagi kina, na vanua kece o kenani, mo ni taukena me sega ni mudu; oi au, me'u nodra kalou talega. "

source_text: and god said unto abraham, thou shalt keep my covenant therefore, thou, and thy seed after thee in their generations.
target_text: sa tukuna na kalou vei eparaama, "o iko, mo maroroya na noqu veiyalayalati, o iko kei ira kece na nomu kawa ki na nodra i tabatamata kecega.

source_text: this is my covenant, which ye shall keep, between me and you and thy seed after thee; every man child among you shall be circumcised.
target_text: "oqo na noqu veiyalayalati mo na maroroya, ena kedaru maliwa kei ira na nomu kawa era na muri mai: o ira kece na gone era tagane ena kemuni maliwa, me ra cilivi;

source_text: and ye shall circumcise the flesh of your foreskin; and it shall be a token of the covenant betwixt me and you.
target_text: "me cilivi na yagomuni vakatagane, oqo mei vakatakilakila ni veiyalayalati ena kedaru maliwa.

source_text: and he that is eight days old shall be circumcised among you, every man child in your generations, he that is born in the house, or bought with money of any stranger, which is not of thy seed.
target_text: "o ira kece sa bogi walu ena nodra sucu mai me ra na cilivi, o ira kece na gone era sucu tagane ena i tabatamata kecega, kei ira na gonetagane era voli mai ena i lavo ka sega ni mai na nomuni kawa.

source_text: he that is born in thy house, and he that is bought with thy money, must needs be circumcised: and my covenant shall be in your flesh for an everlasting covenant.
target_text: "o koya sucu e vale kei ira sa voli ena i lavo me ra cilivi, na noqu veiyalayalati oqo me tiko ena yagomuni (lewemuni) me veiyalayalati e sega ni mudu.

source_text: and the uncircumcised man child whose flesh of his foreskin is not circumcised, that soul shall be cut off from his people; he hath broken my covenant.
target_text: "na gone tagane sa sega ni cilivi, o ira sa sega ni cilivi na lewedra, o koya oqo me qai muduki tani mai vei ira na kawa, baleta ni sa voroka na noqu veiyalayalati. "

source_text: and god said unto abraham, as for sarai thy wife, thou shalt not call her name sarai, but sarah shall her name be.
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna vei eparaama, "vei serai na watimu, ena sega ni yacana o serai, me sa na yacana o sera.

source_text: and i will bless her, and give thee a son also of her: yea, i will bless her, and she shall be a mother of nations; kings of people shall be of her.
target_text: "au na vakalouvinakataki koya, ka au na solia talega vei iko e dua na gone tagane mai vua, o koya ena tinadra na veimatanitu ni'u sa vakalouvinakataki koya, na nodra tui na veitamata era na basika mai vua. "

source_text: then abraham fell upon his face, and laughed, and said in his heart, shall a child be born unto him that is an hundred years old? and shall sarah, that is ninety years old, bear?
target_text: sa cuva vakatoboicu o eparaama ka dredre ka tukuna e yalona, "me vakasucumi beka e dua na gone vua e dua sa dua na drau na nona yabaki ni bula? kei sera, ni sa yabaki ciwasagavulu, me vakasucuma beka e dua na gone? "

source_text: and abraham said unto god, o that ishmael might live before thee!
target_text: sa qai vosa o eparaama vua na kalou ka vaka: "isa, me bula talega o isimeli e matamuni! "

source_text: and god said, sarah thy wife shall bear thee a son indeed; and thou shalt call his name isaac: and i will establish my covenant with him for an everlasting covenant, and with his seed after him.
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna mai, "e sega, o sera na watimu ena vakasucuma e dua na gone tagane, mo vakayacani koya me aisake; au na tekivuna na noqu veiyalayalati e sega ni mudu vata kei koya kei ira na nona kawa era na muri mai.

source_text: and as for ishmael, i have heard thee: behold, i have blessed him, and will make him fruitful, and will multiply him exceedingly; twelve princes shall he beget, and i will make him a great nation.
target_text: "me baleti isimeli, au sa rogoci iko, raica au sa vakalouvinakataki koya, au na vakavuavuai vinakataki koya, ka au na vakalewe levu taki koya vakalevu sara. ena basika mai vua e tinikarua na ravouvou ka au na cakava me matanitu levu.

source_text: but my covenant will i establish with isaac, which sarah shall bear unto thee at this set time in the next year.
target_text: "ia na noqu veiyalayalati au na tekivutaka mai vei aisake, o koya ena vakasucuma vei iko o sera ena gauna vakaoqo ni yabaki vou. "

source_text: and he left off talking with him, and god went up from abraham.
target_text: na kalou sa vakaotia na nona veivosaki kei eparaama, ka sa lako cake na kalou mai vei eparaama.

source_text: and abraham took ishmael his son, and all that were born in his house, and all that were bought with his money, every male among the men of abraham's house; and circumcised the flesh of their foreskin in the selfsame day, as god had said unto him.
target_text: o eparaama sa kauti isimeli na luvena, o ira kece sa sucu ena nona vale, o ira kece sa voli ena i lavo, na tagane kece ena vale nei eparaama, sa cilivi kece na lewedra, nai ubi ni yagodra vakatagane, ena siga vata ga sa vosa kina vua na kalou.

source_text: and abraham was ninety years old and nine, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
target_text: sa yabaki ciwasagavulu ka ciwa o eparaama ena gauna sa cilivi kina na lewena, nai ubi ni yagona vakatagane.

source_text: and ishmael his son was thirteen years old, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
target_text: o isimeli sa yabaki tinikatolu ena gauna sa cilivi kina na lewena, nai ubi ni yagona vakatagane.

source_text: in the selfsame day was abraham circumcised, and ishmael his son.
target_text: ena siga vata ga o ya, sa cilivi kina o eparaama kei isimeli na luvena;

source_text: and all the men of his house, born in the house, and bought with money of the stranger, were circumcised with him.
target_text: kei ira kecega na tagane ena nona vale, o ira sa sucu e vale kei ira sa voli e nai lavo, era sa cilivi vata kei koya.

source_text: and the lord appeared unto him in the plains of mamre: and he sat in the tent door in the heat of the day;
target_text: sa basika o jiova vei eparaama ena vunikau ni mamire, ena nona a dabe tiko ena mata ni nona vale laca, ena katakata ni siga.

source_text: and he lift up his eyes and looked, and, lo, three men stood by him: and when he saw them, he ran to meet them from the tent door, and bowed himself toward the ground,
target_text: sa rai cake ka raica, e tolu na tamata sa tu vata kei koya; ni sa raici iratou, sa cici yani me sotavi iratou, sa cuva sobu ki na qele,

source_text: and said, my lord, if now i have found favour in thy sight, pass not away, i pray thee, from thy servant:
target_text: ka tukuna, "noqu turaga kevaka au sa kune loloma e matamuni, mo ni kua ni lako sivia na nomuni tamata. "

source_text: let a little water, i pray you, be fetched, and wash your feet, and rest yourselves under the tree:
target_text: "me kau mada mai e dua na wai me sava kina na yavamudou, ka dou vakacegu mada ena ruku ni vunikau.

source_text: and i will fetch a morsel of bread, and comfort ye your hearts; after that ye shall pass on: for therefore are ye come to your servant. and they said, so do, as thou hast said.
target_text: "au na kauta mai eso na madrai me vakabulabulataka na yalomudou, ni oti o ya, dou na qai lako, oqo, baleta ni dou sa lako mai vua na nomudou tamata. " e ratou sa tukuna mai, "mo cakava me vaka o sa tukuna. "

source_text: and abraham hastened into the tent unto sarah, and said, make ready quickly three measures of fine meal, knead it, and make cakes upon the hearth.
target_text: sa vakatotolo o eparaama ki na vale laca vei sera ka tukuna, "mo cakava mada vakatotolo e tolu nai vakarau falawa, bulia eso na keke. "

source_text: and abraham ran unto the herd, and fetcht a calf tender and good, and gave it unto a young man; and he hasted to dress it.
target_text: sa cici yani o eparaama ka vakarautaka e dua na luve ni bulumakau vinaka ka solia vua na nona cauravou me vakarautaka vakatotolo.

source_text: and he took butter, and milk, and the calf which he had dressed, and set it before them; and he stood by them under the tree, and they did eat.
target_text: sa kauta mai na bata kei na sucu kei na manumanu sa vakarautaki, ka vakarautaka e matadratou; sa tu vakarau tuga o eparaama ena ruku ni vunikau ni ratou sa kana tiko.

source_text: and they said unto him, where is sarah thy wife? and he said, behold, in the tent.
target_text: e ratou sa tukuna vei eparaama, "e vei o sera na watimu? " sa sauma mai, "oqo ena vale laca. "

source_text: and he said, i will certainly return unto thee according to the time of life; and, lo, sarah thy wife shall have a son. and sarah heard it in the tent door, which was behind him.
target_text: sa qai tukuna o koya, "au na lesu tale mai vei iko ena gauna ni bula, ka raica, o sera na watimu ena vakasucuma e dua na gone tagane. " (sa vakarorogo tu o sera ena mata ni katuba ena dakui koya e vosa tiko. )

source_text: now abraham and sarah were old and well stricken in age; and it ceased to be with sarah after the manner of women.
target_text: o eparaama kei sera e rau sa qase sara ka sa levu na nodrau veiyabaki; sa sivia talega o sera na veiyabaki ni vakasucu gone.

source_text: therefore sarah laughed within herself, saying, after i am waxed old shall i have pleasure, my lord being old also?
target_text: sa cuva ka dredre ga e lomana o sera ka tukuna, "au sa qase mai oqo, me'u na ia tale beka na veidomoni, ni sa qase talega o noqu turaga? "

source_text: and the lord said unto abraham, wherefore did sarah laugh, saying, shall i of a surety bear a child, which am old?
target_text: sa tukuna mai o jiova vei eparaama, "na cava e dredre kina, o sera ka tukuna, 'au na vakasucu beka, ni'u sa qase mai? '

source_text: is any thing too hard for the lord? at the time appointed i will return unto thee, according to the time of life, and sarah shall have a son.
target_text: "e dua beka na ka e sa rui dredre vei jiova? ena gauna sa lokuci, au na lesu tale mai vei iko, me vaka na gauna ni bula, o sera ena vakasucuma mai e dua na gone tagane. "

source_text: then sarah denied, saying, i laughed not; for she was afraid. and he said, nay; but thou didst laugh.
target_text: sa cakitaka o sera ka tukuna, "au a sega ni dredre, " baleta talega ni sa rere. sa tukuna mai o jiova, "e sega, o iko, e a dredre dina! "

source_text: and the men rose up from thence, and looked toward sodom: and abraham went with them to bring them on the way.
target_text: e ratou sa tucake na tamata, ka rai yani ki sotoma, sa lako talega vata kei iratou o eparaama me raica na nodratou lesu yani.

source_text: and the lord said, shall i hide from abraham that thing which i do;
target_text: sa tukuna o jiova, "me'u vunitaka beka vei eparaama na veika au na cakava,

source_text: seeing that abraham shall surely become a great and mighty nation, and all the nations of the earth shall be blessed in him?
target_text: "baleta, ni o eparaama ena yaco me matanitu levu ka qaqa, na veimatanitu taucoko e vuravura era na vakalouvinakataki mai vua?

source_text: for i know him, that he will command his children and his household after him, and they shall keep the way of the lord, to do justice and judgment; that the lord may bring upon abraham that which he hath spoken of him.
target_text: "ni'u sa kilai koya, me rawa kina vua me vakaroti ira na luvena kei ira na nona vuvale era muri koya, me ra muria na sala i jiova, me ra cakava na ka dodonu kei na lewa, me kauta mai kina o jiova vei eparaama na veika sa vosa oti kina vua. "

source_text: and the lord said, because the cry of sodom and gomorrah is great, and because their sin is very grievous;
target_text: sa qai tukuna tale o jiova, "baleta na tagi me baleti sotoma kei komora sa rui levu sara, kei nai valavala ca sa rui vakasisila dina,

source_text: i will go down now, and see whether they have done altogether according to the cry of it, which is come unto me; and if not, i will know.
target_text: "au na lako sobu oqo, me'u raica, se, sa dina na veika sa lako cake mai vei au; ke sega, au na kila. "

source_text: and the men turned their faces from thence, and went toward sodom: but abraham stood yet before the lord.
target_text: e ratou sa lako tani mai kea na tamata, ka lako vaka ki sotoma, o eparaama e se tu ga ena mata i jiova.

source_text: and abraham drew near, and said, wilt thou also destroy the righteous with the wicked?
target_text: sa lako voleka mai o eparaama ka tukuna, "o ni na vakarusai ira vata na yalododonu kei ira nai valavala ca?

source_text: peradventure there be fifty righteous within the city: wilt thou also destroy and not spare the place for the fifty righteous that are therein?
target_text: "kevaka mada ga era sa tiko ena koro e limasagavulu na yalododonu â€œo ni na vakarusa vata kei ira na yalododonu oqo?

source_text: that be far from thee to do after this manner, to slay the righteous with the wicked: and that the righteous should be as the wicked, that be far from thee: shall not the judge of all the earth do right?
target_text: "e sega ni dodonu vei kemuni oqo, mo ni vakarusai ira vata na yalododonu kei ira na i valavala ca, me ra vaka kina nai valavala ca na yalododonu â€œme yawa sara vei kemuni oqo. me kua beka ni lewa vakadodonu na turaga ni lewa levu kei vuravura? "

source_text: and the lord said, if i find in sodom fifty righteous within the city, then i will spare all the place for their sakes.
target_text: sa tukuna mai o jiova: "kevaka au sa kunea e sotoma e limasagavulu na tamata yalododonu, au na sega ni vakarusa na koro ena vukudra na lewe limasagavulu na yalododonu oqo. "

source_text: and abraham answered and said, behold now, i have taken upon me to speak unto the lord, which am but dust and ashes:
target_text: sa vosa tale yani o eparaama ka vaka, "o au sa vaka ga na kuvu ni soso kei na dravusa, o cei o au me'u vosa vei jiova:

source_text: peradventure there shall lack five of the fifty righteous: wilt thou destroy all the city for lack of five? and he said, if i find there forty and five, i will not destroy it.
target_text: "kevaka mada ga me vasagavulu ka lima na tamata yalododonu, o ni na vakarusa tikoga na koro? " sa tukuna mai o jiova, "kevaka au sa raica kina e vasagavulu ka lima na tamata yalododonu, au na sega ni vakarusa na koro. "

source_text: and he spake unto him yet again, and said, peradventure there shall be forty found there. and he said, i will not do it for forty's sake.
target_text: sa vosa tale vei jiova o eparaama, "kevaka mada ga sa kune kina e vasagavulu na yalododonu? " sa sauma mai o jiova, "au na sega ni cakava ena vukudra na vasagavulu oqori. "

source_text: and he said unto him, oh let not the lord be angry, and i will speak: peradventure there shall thirty be found there. and he said, i will not do it, if i find thirty there.
target_text: sa tukuna tale, "me kua ni cudru mada o jiova, au na qai vosa: kevaka mada ga sa kune kina e tolusagavulu na yalododonu? " sa sauma yani o jiova, "au na sega ni cakava ena vukudra na tolusagavulu na yalododonu oqori. "

source_text: and he said, behold now, i have taken upon me to speak unto the lord: peradventure there shall be twenty found there. and he said, i will not destroy it for twenty's sake.
target_text: sa tukuna tale, "oqo sa na bale ga vei au, au na vosa yani oqo vei jiova: vakacava ke ruasagavulu na tamata yalododonu era kune ena koro? " sa tukuna mai o jiova, "au na sega ni vakarusa. "

source_text: and he said, oh let not the lord be angry, and i will speak yet but this once: peradventure ten shall be found there. and he said, i will not destroy it for ten's sake.
target_text: sa tukuna tale, "me kua ni cudru o jiova, me'u vosa tale vakadua ga, vakacava ke kune kina e tini na yalododonu? " sa tukuna mai o jiova, "au na sega ni vakarusa ena vukudra na lewe tini oqori. "

source_text: and the lord went his way, as soon as he had left communing with abraham: and abraham returned unto his place.
target_text: sa lako sara yani o jiova ena nona sala ni sa vosa oti vei eparaama â€œka sa lesu tale o eparaama ki na nona tikina.

source_text: and there came two angels to sodom at even; and lot sat in the gate of sodom: and lot seeing them rose up to meet them; and he bowed himself with his face toward the ground;
target_text: e rua na agilosi sa lako mai sotoma ena yakavi, o loti sa dabe tiko ena matamata mai sotoma. ni sa raici rau o loti, sa lako yani me sotavi rau, sa cuva ka vakarokoroko vei rau.

source_text: and he said, behold now, my lords, turn in, i pray you, into your servant's house, and tarry all night, and wash your feet, and ye shall rise up early, and go on your ways. and they said, nay; but we will abide in the street all night.
target_text: sa tukuna sara, "oqo, oi kemudrau na noqu turaga, drau lako mai ki na nona vale na nomuni tamata ka vakacegu mada kina ena bogi oqo, mo ni mai savata mada na yavamuni, ka qai yadra ena mataka caca ka gole yani. " e rau sa tukuna, "e sega, keirau na moce tuga ena saqata. "

source_text: and he pressed upon them greatly; and they turned in unto him, and entered into his house; and he made them a feast, and did bake unleavened bread, and they did eat.
target_text: sa cikevi rau vakaukauwa, ka rau sa lako mai ki na nona vale. sa cakava veirau e dua nai vakayakavi, ka vavia veirau na madrai sega ni vakaleveni ka rau sa kana sara.

source_text: but before they lay down, the men of the city, even the men of sodom, compassed the house round, both old and young, all the people from every quarter:
target_text: ni se bera ni rau davo sobu me moce, o ira na tagane ena koro, o ira na tagane e sotoma, kece, o ira na qase kei ira na gone â€œo ira kece mai na vei tikina, era sa mai vakavolivolita na vale ka tagava.

source_text: and they called unto lot, and said unto him, where are the men which came in to thee this night? bring them out unto us, that we may know them.
target_text: era sa kaci yani vei loti ka tukuna, "e vei oi rau na tamata e rau sa lako mai vei iko ena bogi oqo? kauti rau mai tuba me keimami mai tulevu taki rau mada. "

source_text: and lot went out at the door unto them, and shut the door after him,
target_text: sa lako yani ki tuba o loti vei ira na tamata ka sogota na katuba mai dakuna;

source_text: and said, i pray you, brethren, do not so wickedly.
target_text: ka tukuna, "au kerei kemuni na taciqu, mo ni kua na cakava na ka vakasisila oqo!

source_text: behold now, i have two daughters which have not known man; let me, i pray you, bring them out unto you, and do ye to them as is good in your eyes: only unto these men do nothing; for therefore came they under the shadow of my roof.
target_text: "raica sa rua tiko na luvequ yalewa, era se bera ni kila na tagane, me'u kauti rau mai vei kemuni ka cakava vei rau na veika ga o ni vinakata; me kua ga vei rau na noqu vulagi oqo â€œni oqo ga na vuna e rau mai vakaruru kina ena noqu vale. "

source_text: and they said, stand back. and they said again, this one fellow came in to sojourn, and he will needs be a judge: now will we deal worse with thee, than with them. and they pressed sore upon the man, even lot, and came near to break the door.
target_text: era sa tukuna mai, "mo tu vakasuka, " era sa tukuna tale, "o koya mada ga oqo, e se qai lako vou mai, ka sa via mai turaganilewa sara, keimami na cakava vaka ca sara vei iko, mai vei rau na rua oqori. " era sa vakaukauwataki loti, me baleti rau na nona vulagi, ka sa voleka sara na kabasu mai na katuba.

source_text: but the men put forth their hand, and pulled lot into the house to them, and shut to the door.
target_text: oi rau na tamata (agilosi) e rau sa dodoka yani na ligadrau, ka dreti loti mai ki loma ni vale ka sogota na katuba.

source_text: and they smote the men that were at the door of the house with blindness, both small and great: so that they wearied themselves to find the door.
target_text: e rau sa samuti ira na tamata ena mataboko, o ira kece sa tu ena mata ni katuba. o ira na lelevu kei ira na lalai, sa dredre kina me ra kila se e vei na katuba ni vale.

source_text: and the men said unto lot, hast thou here any besides? son in law, and thy sons, and thy daughters, and whatsoever thou hast in the city, bring them out of this place:
target_text: e rau sa tukuna na tamata (agilosi) vei loti, "sa tiko tale e dua na wekamu eke? na vugomu, se luvemu tagane se luvemu yalewa, se o cei ga sa tiko ena koro â€œme ra kautani yani!

source_text: for we will destroy this place, because the cry of them is waxen great before the face of the lord; and the lord hath sent us to destroy it.
target_text: "ni keirau na vakarusa na vanua oqo, baleta ni sa lako cake yani vei jiova na veika ca ni vanua oqo â€œsa talai keirau mai kina o jiova me vakarusa. "

source_text: and lot went out, and spake unto his sons in law, which married his daughters, and said, up, get you out of this place; for the lord will destroy this city. but he seemed as one that mocked unto his sons in law.
target_text: sa lako yani o loti me vosa vei rau na vugona tagane (oi rau na watidrau na luvei loti yalewa) "drau tucake ka dro yani â€œo jiova ena vakarusa na vanua oqo! " vei rau na vugona â€œsa vaka ga e veiwali tiko o loti.

source_text: and when the morning arose, then the angels hastened lot, saying, arise, take thy wife, and thy two daughters, which are here; lest thou be consumed in the iniquity of the city.
target_text: ni sa kida mai na mataka, e rau sa vakatotolo taki loti na agilosi ka tukuna, "tucake, taura na watimu kei rau na luvemu yalewa, de dou qai kama vata ena vakarusai ni koro oqo. "

source_text: and while he lingered, the men laid hold upon his hand, and upon the hand of his wife, and upon the hand of his two daughters; the lord being merciful unto him: and they brought him forth, and set him without the city.
target_text: ni se vakaberabera tikoga, na agilosi, sa taura na ligana, na ligai watina kei na ligadrau na luvena yalewa, ni sa rui lomani koya o jiova, e rau sa kauti koya mai ka sereki koya ena taudaku ni koro.

source_text: and it came to pass, when they had brought them forth abroad, that he said, escape for thy life; look not behind thee, neither stay thou in all the plain; escape to the mountain, lest thou be consumed.
target_text: sa qai yaco ni ratou sa kau mai ki taudaku ni koro, sa qai tukuni vua, "dro mo bula â€œkua ni rai tale i muri se mo vakacegu ena buca. dro ki na veiulunivanua, de o na vakarusai talega. "

source_text: and lot said unto them, oh, not so, my lord:
target_text: sa tukuna yani o loti, "isa noqu turaga, me kua oqori!

source_text: behold now, thy servant hath found grace in thy sight, and thou hast magnified thy mercy, which thou hast shewed unto me in saving my life; and i cannot escape to the mountain, lest some evil take me, and i die:
target_text: "sa kune loloma na nomuni tamata e matamuni; o ni sa vakalevutaka na nomuni loloma o ni sa vakaraitaka, ena nomuni vakabulai au; au sa sega ni rawa ni dro ki na veiulunivanua â€œde ra qai toboki au na ca ka vakamatei au.

source_text: behold now, this city is near to flee unto, and it is a little one: oh, let me escape thither, (is it not a little one? ) and my soul shall live.
target_text: "sa voleka na koro oqo me'u dro kina, e koro lailai ga me'u dro kina, me bula kina na yaloqu. "

source_text: and he said unto him, see, i have accepted thee concerning this thing also, that i will not overthrow this city, for the which thou hast spoken.
target_text: sa tukuna mai na agilosi vua, "raica, au sa totaki iko ena vuku ni ka oqo. au na sega ni vakarusa na koro oqo, o sa digitaka mo dro kina.

source_text: haste thee, escape thither; for i cannot do any thing till thou be come thither. therefore the name of the city was called zoar.
target_text: "totolo sara dro yani kina, au na sega mada ni cakava e dua na ka me yacova ni dou sa yaco kina. " sa yaca ni koro o ya o soa.

source_text: the sun was risen upon the earth when lot entered into zoar.
target_text: sa cadra na siga e vuravura ni sa curu yani ki soa o loti.

source_text: then the lord rained upon sodom and upon gomorrah brimstone and fire from the lord out of heaven;
target_text: sa qai vakatauca o jiova na kuvu kama, kei na bukawaqa e sotoma kei komore, mai vei jiova mai lomalagi.

source_text: and he overthrew those cities, and all the plain, and all the inhabitants of the cities, and that which grew upon the ground.
target_text: o jiova sa vuaviritaka na veikoro oqori, na veibuca kei ira kece na lewe ni koro kei na veika sa tubu mai na qele.

source_text: but his wife looked back from behind him, and she became a pillar of salt.
target_text: o watina sa rai lesu me raici loti, ka sa yaco me duru vatu (masima).

source_text: and abraham gat up early in the morning to the place where he stood before the lord:
target_text: sa lako vaka mataka o eparaama, ena vanua sa tu kina o koya ena mata i jiova.

source_text: and he looked toward sodom and gomorrah, and toward all the land of the plain, and beheld, and, lo, the smoke of the country went up as the smoke of a furnace.
target_text: sa rai yani vaka ki sotoma kei komora, kei na veivanua vaka ki na buca, ka sa raica na kubou ni vanua sa vaka na kubou ni dua na kama levu.

source_text: and it came to pass, when god destroyed the cities of the plain, that god remembered abraham, and sent lot out of the midst of the overthrow, when he overthrew the cities in the which lot dwelt.
target_text: sa qai yaco ni sa vakarusa oti na kalou na veikoro kece mai na buca, na kalou sa qai nanumi eparaama, ka sa qai vakatalai loti tani mai na nona vuaviri oqo, ni sa vuaviritaka na veikoro sa tiko kina o loti.

source_text: and lot went up out of zoar, and dwelt in the mountain, and his two daughters with him; for he feared to dwell in zoar: and he dwelt in a cave, he and his two daughters.
target_text: sa lako tani mai soa o loti ka la'ki tiko ena veiulunivanua vata kei rau na luvena yalewa. ni sa rere ni tiko e soa. e ratou sa la'ki tiko ena veiqaravatu.

source_text: and the firstborn said unto the younger, our father is old, and there is not a man in the earth to come in unto us after the manner of all the earth:
target_text: sa tukuna o koya e qase veirau na yalewa vei koya e gone, "sa qase o tamadaru, sa sega na tagane me mai curumi kedaru me vaka na kena i valavala e vuravura.

source_text: come, let us make our father drink wine, and we will lie with him, that we may preserve seed of our father.
target_text: "me daru vakamatenitaki tamadaru ena waini, ka me daru curumi kina mai vua, me daru maroroya kina na kawa mai vei tamadaru. "

source_text: and they made their father drink wine that night: and the firstborn went in, and lay with her father; and he perceived not when she lay down, nor when she arose.
target_text: e rau sa vakagunuvi tamadrau ena waini ena bogi o ya, sa lako yani o koya e qase ka vakacurumi tamana vua. sa sega ni kila o tamana na nona lako yani kei na nona lesu mai.

source_text: and it came to pass on the morrow, that the firstborn said unto the younger, behold, i lay yesternight with my father: let us make him drink wine this night also; and go thou in, and lie with him, that we may preserve seed of our father.
target_text: ena siga ka tarava, sa tukuna na qase vua na tacina gone, "au sa vakacurumi tamaqu oti vei au ena bogi, oqo me daru cakava tale na waini, me gunu ena bogi oqo, ka mo lako yani, ka vakacurumi koya vei iko me maroroi kina na kawa mai vei tamadaru. "

source_text: and they made their father drink wine that night also: and the younger arose, and lay with him; and he perceived not when she lay down, nor when she arose.
target_text: e rau sa vakagunuvi tamadrau ena bogi o ya. sa tucake yani o koya e gone, ka la'ki vakacurumi tamana vua. sa sega ni kila o tamana na nona lako yani kei na nona lesu mai.

source_text: thus were both the daughters of lot with child by their father.
target_text: oi rau ruarua na luvei loti yalewa oqo, e rau sa vakagone mai vei tamadrau.

source_text: and the firstborn bare a son, and called his name moab: the same is the father of the moabites unto this day.
target_text: sa vakasucuma e dua na gone tagane o koya e qase, ka sa vakayacani me o moape; o koya sa tamadra na moape me yacova na siga oqo.

source_text: and the younger, she also bare a son, and called his name benammi: the same is the father of the children of ammon unto this day.
target_text: o koya talega sa gone veirau, sa vakasucuma e dua talega na gone tagane, ka sa vakayacani me peni-ame (peniame). o koya oqo na tamadra na amoni me yacova na siga oqo.

source_text: and abraham journeyed from thence toward the south country, and dwelled between kadesh and shur, and sojourned in gerar.
target_text: sa lako yani o eparaama mai kea vaka ki na ceva me tiko ena kedrau maliwa o ketesa kei suri ka lako sara yani ki kerari.

source_text: and abraham said of sarah his wife, she is my sister: and abimelech king of gerar sent, and took sarah.
target_text: sa tukuna o eparaama ena vuku i sera na watina, "ni o koya na ganena. " sa talatala yani o apimeleki na tui kerari, me kau mai vua o sera.

source_text: but god came to abimelech in a dream by night, and said to him, behold, thou art but a dead man, for the woman which thou hast taken; for she is a man's wife.
target_text: na kalou sa lako mai vei apimeleki ena tadra e na bogi ka tukuna vua, "mo kila ni o sa tamata mate ena vuku ni yalewa o sa taura mai; ni sa watina e dua na tagane o koya. "

source_text: but abimelech had not come near her: and he said, lord, wilt thou slay also a righteous nation?
target_text: ia, o apimeleki e se bera ni tarai koya, ka sa tukuna kina, "i jiova, o ni na vakarusa talega e dua na matanitu yalododonu?

source_text: said he not unto me, she is my sister? and she, even she herself said, he is my brother: in the integrity of my heart and innocency of my hands have i done this.
target_text: "e sega beka ni a tukuna vei au, 'o koya na ganequ'? na yalewa mada sa tukuna 'ni o koya o ya na ganena tagane. ' ena dina ni yaloqu kei na savasava ni ligaqu, au sa cakava kina oqo. "

source_text: and god said unto him in a dream, yea, i know that thou didst this in the integrity of thy heart; for i also withheld thee from sinning against me: therefore suffered i thee not to touch her.
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna vua ena tadra, "au sa kila ni o cakava oqo ena dina ni yalomu, o au talega talega, au sa tarovi iko mo kua ni valavala ca vei au, oqori na vuna au sega ni vakatara kina mo tarai koya.

source_text: now therefore restore the man his wife; for he is a prophet, and he shall pray for thee, and thou shalt live: and if thou restore her not, know thou that thou shalt surely die, thou, and all that are thine.
target_text: "mo vakasuka tale na yalewa vua na watina, ni sa parofita o koya, ena qai masulaki iko; o na qai bula. kevaka o sa sega ni cakava oqo â€œo na mate vakaidina, o iko kei ira kecega sa nomu. "

source_text: therefore abimelech rose early in the morning, and called all his servants, and told all these things in their ears: and the men were sore afraid.
target_text: sa sou o apimeleki ka kacivi ira na nona tamata, ka tukuna na veika kece oqo ni ra sa vakarorogo tu, era se rere na nona tamata.

source_text: then abimelech called abraham, and said unto him, what hast thou done unto us? and what have i offended thee, that thou hast brought on me and on my kingdom a great sin? thou hast done deeds unto me that ought not to be done.
target_text: o apimeleki sa kacivi eparaama ka tukuna vua, "na cava o sa cakava vei keimami? na cala cava au cakava vei iko, mo kauta mai kina ki na noqu matanitu, na i valavala ca levu oqo? o sa cakava vei au na veika e sega ni dodonu me caka. "

source_text: and abimelech said unto abraham, what sawest thou, that thou hast done this thing?
target_text: sa qai tukuna o apimeleki vei eparaama, "na cava o nanuma, ena nomu cakava kina vei au na ka oqo? "

source_text: and abraham said, because i thought, surely the fear of god is not in this place; and they will slay me for my wife's sake.
target_text: sa sauma mai o eparaama, "baleta au sa kila ni sa sega eke na rerevaka na kalou, era na vakamatei au kina ena vuku i watiqu.

source_text: and yet indeed she is my sister; she is the daughter of my father, but not the daughter of my mother; and she became my wife.
target_text: "o sa dina, e ganequ dina o koya, o koya e luvei tamaqu, ka sega ga ni luvei tinaqu, oqori sa mai watiqu kina.

source_text: and it came to pass, when god caused me to wander from my father's house, that i said unto her, this is thy kindness which thou shalt shew unto me; at every place whither we shall come, say of me, he is my brother.
target_text: "ni sa vakavuna na kalou, me'u lako tani mai na vale i tamaqu, au sa tukuna kina vua, 'oqo na ka vinaka mo cakava vei au; ena vanua kecega daru na lako kina, mo na tukuna ni, "o koya na ganequ. "'"

source_text: and abimelech took sheep, and oxen, and menservants, and womenservants, and gave them unto abraham, and restored him sarah his wife.
target_text: sa kauta mai o apimeleki na sipi kei na bulumakau kei ira na dauveiqaravi tagane kei na yalewa, ka soli ira vei eparaama, ka sa soli sera lesu tale vua.

source_text: and abimelech said, behold, my land is before thee: dwell where it pleaseth thee.
target_text: sa tukuna o apimeleki, "raica na vanua sa tu oqori e matamu, mo tiko ena vanua o vinakata. "

source_text: and unto sarah he said, behold, i have given thy brother a thousand pieces of silver: behold, he is to thee a covering of the eyes, unto all that are with thee, and with all other: thus she was reproved.
target_text: sa tukuna talega vei sera, "raica au sa solia vei ganemu e dua na udolu na tiki ni siliva, oqo me vakagalalataki iko mai vei ira kecega na tamata" â€œoqo sa vakadonui kina o sera.

source_text: so abraham prayed unto god: and god healed abimelech, and his wife, and his maidservants; and they bare children.
target_text: o eparaama sa masu vua na kalou: na kalou sa vakabulai apimeleki, na watina kei ira na nona dauveiqaravi. sa tekivu me ra vakaluveni;

source_text: for the lord had fast closed up all the wombs of the house of abimelech, because of sarah abraham's wife.
target_text: ni o jiova, sa sogota kece na kato ni gone ena vuvale kece nei apimeleki, baleti sera na wati eparaama.

source_text: and the lord visited sarah as he had said, and the lord did unto sarah as he had spoken.
target_text: o jiova, sa sikovi sera me vaka ga ea tukuna, o jiova, sa cakava vei sera me vaka ga ea tukuna.

source_text: for sarah conceived, and bare abraham a son in his old age, at the set time of which god had spoken to him.
target_text: sa kunekune o sera ka vakasucuma vei eparaama e dua na luvena tagane ni sa qase sara, ena gauna lokuci ga sa vosa kina vua na kalou.

source_text: and abraham called the name of his son that was born unto him, whom sarah bare to him, isaac.
target_text: sa vakayacani koya o eparaama, na luvena taganeâ€ na luvena tagane sa vakasucuma o sera â€œme o aisake.

source_text: and abraham circumcised his son isaac being eight days old, as god had commanded him.
target_text: o eparaama sa cilivi na luvena o aisake ni sa bogi walu oti, me vaka sa vakarota vua na kalou.

source_text: and abraham was an hundred years old, when his son isaac was born unto him.
target_text: sa yabaki dua na drau o eparaama ena gauna sa sucu kina o aisake.

source_text: and sarah said, god hath made me to laugh, so that all that hear will laugh with me.
target_text: sa tukuna o sera, "na kalou sa vakavuna me'u dredre, ni o ira kece era na rogoca, era na dredre vata kei au. "

source_text: and she said, who would have said unto abraham, that sarah should have given children suck? for i have born him a son in his old age.
target_text: sa tukuna talega, "o cei ena tukuna rawa vei eparaama, ni na mea e dua na gone o sera? ni'u sa vakasucuma vua e dua na gone vua ni sa qase sara o koya. "

source_text: and the child grew, and was weaned: and abraham made a great feast the same day that isaac was weaned.
target_text: sa tubu cake na gone ka sa kali sara. sa cakava o eparaama e dua na kakana levu ena siga sa kali kina o aisake.

source_text: and sarah saw the son of hagar the egyptian, which she had born unto abraham, mocking.
target_text: o sera, sa raica na luvei eka na yalewa ni ijipita vei eparaama ni veivakalialiai tiko.

source_text: wherefore she said unto abraham, cast out this bondwoman and her son: for the son of this bondwoman shall not be heir with my son, even with isaac.
target_text: sa tukuna kina vei eparaama, "mo vakagalalataki rau na yalewa bobula kei na luvena; na luvena na yalewa bobula ena sega ni mai taukei vata kei na luvequ o aisake. "

source_text: and the thing was very grievous in abraham's sight because of his son.
target_text: na veika oqo sa sega ni taleitaka o eparaama baleta na luvena o isimeli.

source_text: and god said unto abraham, let it not be grievous in thy sight because of the lad, and because of thy bondwoman; in all that sarah hath said unto thee, hearken unto her voice; for in isaac shall thy seed be called.
target_text: ia, na kalou sa tukuna vei eparaama, "me kakua ni vakararawataki iko na veika me baleta na gone se o tinana na yalewa bobula. na veika sa tukuna vei iko o sera, mo rogoca na domona, baleta ena lako mai vei aisake na nomu kawa.

source_text: and also of the son of the bondwoman will i make a nation, because he is thy seed.
target_text: "au na cakava talega e dua na matanitu mai vua na luve ni bobula, baleta ni sa luvemu talega. "

source_text: and abraham rose up early in the morning, and took bread, and a bottle of water, and gave it unto hagar, putting it on her shoulder, and the child, and sent her away: and she departed, and wandered in the wilderness of beersheba.
target_text: sa sou ena mataka o eparaama ka kauta na madrai kei na wai, ka biuta e domo i eka ka solia na gone vua, sa qai vakatalai rau yani. e rau sa lako yani ka lako voli ena vanua liwa e perisepa.

source_text: and the water was spent in the bottle, and she cast the child under one of the shrubs.
target_text: sa maca na wai mai na kena bola, ka sa vakadabera tiko na gone ena dua na veico.

source_text: and she went, and sat her down over against him a good way off, as it were a bowshot: for she said, let me not see the death of the child. and she sat over against him, and lift up her voice, and wept.
target_text: sa lako yani o tinana, ka la'ki dabe veibasai tiko mai vei koya, me vaka e dua nai vana ena dakai titi, ni sa tukuna tikoga e lomana, "me'u kua ni raica na nona mate na gone. " sa dabe tikoga mai vakayawa ka tagi tiko vakadomoilevu.

source_text: and god heard the voice of the lad; and the angel of god called to hagar out of heaven, and said unto her, what aileth thee, hagar? fear not; for god hath heard the voice of the lad where he is.
target_text: na kalou sa rogoca na domo ni gone, ka sa kaci yani vei eka na agilosi ni kalou mai lomalagi ka tukuna vua, "na cava o sa tagi kina eka? kua ni rere, na kalou sa rogoca na domona na gone mai na vanua e tiko kina.

source_text: arise, lift up the lad, and hold him in thine hand; for i will make him a great nation.
target_text: "mo tucake, keveta na gone e ligamu, ni'u na cakava me matanitu levu o koya. "

source_text: and god opened her eyes, and she saw a well of water; and she went, and filled the bottle with water, and gave the lad drink.
target_text: na kalou sa vakaraitaka na matana, ka sa raica sara e dua na tobu wai. sa la'ki takiva sara na wai ena kena bola, ka solia vua na gone me gunu.

source_text: and god was with the lad; and he grew, and dwelt in the wilderness, and became an archer.
target_text: na kalou sa tiko vata kei na gone; sa tubu cake na gone ka sa dau tiko ena vanua liwa, sa yaco talega me dauvavana.

source_text: and he dwelt in the wilderness of paran: and his mother took him a wife out of the land of egypt.
target_text: sa dautiko ena vanua liwa mai parana, sa kauta vua o tinana e dua na watina mai na vanua o ijipita. e dua na veiyalayalati vata kei apimeleki

source_text: and it came to pass at that time, that abimelech and phichol the chief captain of his host spake unto abraham, saying, god is with thee in all that thou doest:
target_text: sa yaco mai e dua na gauna, o apimeleki kei fikoli, (nai liuliu ni mataivalu na apimeleki) e rau sa veivosaki kei eparaama ka vaka: "sa tiko vata kei iko na kalou ena veika kecega o cakava.

source_text: now therefore swear unto me here by god that thou wilt not deal falsely with me, nor with my son, nor with my son's son: but according to the kindness that i have done unto thee, thou shalt do unto me, and to the land wherein thou hast sojourned.
target_text: "mo yalataka vei au ena kalou, ni o na sega ni cakacaka vaka i lasu vei au, vei ira na noqu kawa kei na veika au taukena; me vaka ga na veika vivinaka au sa cakava vei iko, mo cakava vaka kina vei au, ki na vanua talega o na lako kina. "

source_text: and abraham said, i will swear.
target_text: sa sauma o eparaama, "au na cakava vaka kina. "

source_text: and abraham reproved abimelech because of a well of water, which abimelech's servants had violently taken away.
target_text: o eparaama sa vakadodonutaki apimeleki, baleta na mataniwai era sa taura vakaukauwa na dauveiqaravi nei apimeleki.

source_text: and abimelech said, i wot not who hath done this thing: neither didst thou tell me, neither yet heard i of it, but to day.
target_text: sa tukuna o apimeleki, "au sega ni kila, se o cei sa cakava na ka oqo: o iko sa sega ni tukuna vei au, se me'u rogoca me yacova na siga oqo. "

source_text: and abraham took sheep and oxen, and gave them unto abimelech; and both of them made a covenant.
target_text: sa taura na sipi kei na bulumakau o eparaama ka solia vei apimeleki, ka ra sa cakava e dua na veiyalayalati.

source_text: and abraham set seven ewe lambs of the flock by themselves.
target_text: sa vakatala yani o eparaama e vitu na luve ni sipi vakataki ira ga.

source_text: and abimelech said unto abraham, what mean these seven ewe lambs which thou hast set by themselves?
target_text: sa tarogi eparaama o apimeleki, "na cava na kena i balebale oqo, na lami o sa vakatalai ira oqo? "

source_text: and he said, for these seven ewe lambs shalt thou take of my hand, that they may be a witness unto me, that i have digged this well.
target_text: sa tukuna mai, "mo taura mai ligaqu na lami oqo, me noqu i vakadinadina ni'u sa kelia na tobu oqo. "

source_text: wherefore he called that place beersheba; because there they sware both of them.
target_text: sa vakayacani kina na vanua me perisepa, baleta ni rau sa bubului ena veiyalayalati e kea.

source_text: thus they made a covenant at beersheba: then abimelech rose up, and phichol the chief captain of his host, and they returned into the land of the philistines.
target_text: e rau sa cakava na veiyalayalati e perisepa, sa tucake o apimeleki kei fikoli (nai liuliu ni mataivalu) ka rau sa lesu tale ki na vanua o filisitia.

source_text: and abraham planted a grove in beersheba, and called there on the name of the lord, the everlasting god.
target_text: sa tea o eparaama e dua na vu ni tamarisi e perisepa, ka sa kaciva mai kea na yaca i jiova, na kalou sega ni mudu.

source_text: and abraham sojourned in the philistines' land many days.
target_text: sa lako voli o eparaama e lomai filisitia me vica vata na siga.

source_text: and it came to pass after these things, that god did tempt abraham, and said unto him, abraham: and he said, behold, here i am.
target_text: sa oti kece na veika oqo, na kalou sa vakatovolei eparaama, ka tukuna vua, "i eparaama, " sa sauma mai, "sai au oqo. "

source_text: and he said, take now thy son, thine only son isaac, whom thou lovest, and get thee into the land of moriah; and offer him there for a burnt offering upon one of the mountains which i will tell thee of.
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna tale vua, "mo kauta na luvemu, na luvemu tagane e dua ga o aisake, o koya, o sa daulomana, lako ki na vanua o moraia â€œla'ki vakacabori koya me i soro kama ena dua na ulunivanua au na tukuna vei iko. "

source_text: and abraham rose up early in the morning, and saddled his ass, and took two of his young men with him, and isaac his son, and clave the wood for the burnt offering, and rose up, and went unto the place of which god had told him.
target_text: sa sou ena mataka o eparaama, sa vakarautaka na nona asa, ka kauta e rua na nona cauravou vata kei koya, kei aisake na luvena; sa taya na buka ni soro kama â€œsa tucake ka lako ki na vanua sa tukuna vua, na kalou.

source_text: then on the third day abraham lifted up his eyes, and saw the place afar off.
target_text: ena i katolu ni siga, sa rai cake o eparaama, sa raica sara na vanua vakayawa.

source_text: and abraham said unto his young men, abide ye here with the ass; and i and the lad will go yonder and worship, and come again to you.
target_text: sa tukuna o eparaama vei rau na nona cauravou, "drau tiko eke kei na asa, na gone kei au, keirau na lako yani ka lotu vei jiova ka qai lesu tale mai vei kemudrau. "

source_text: and abraham took the wood of the burnt offering, and laid it upon isaac his son; and he took the fire in his hand, and a knife; and they went both of them together.
target_text: o, eparaama sa kauta yani na buka ni soro kama ka vakataqara vei aisake, sa taura mai na buka e waqa kei nai sele, e rau sa lako vata yani.

source_text: and isaac spake unto abraham his father, and said, my father: and he said, here am i, my son. and he said, behold the fire and the wood: but where is the lamb for a burnt offering?
target_text: sa taro o aisake, vei eparaama na tamana ka vaka: "tamaqu, " sa sauma yani, "sai au oqo na luvequ, " sa tukuna sara mai, "raica na buka e waqa kei na kau me buka sa tu oqo, e vei ga na lami me i soro kama? "

source_text: and abraham said, my son, god will provide himself a lamb for a burnt offering: so they went both of them together.
target_text: sa sauma yani o eparaama, "na luvequ na kalou ena vakarautaka vei koya ga e dua na lami me i soro kama. " e rau sa lako ruarua vata yani.

source_text: and they came to the place which god had told him of; and abraham built an altar there, and laid the wood in order, and bound isaac his son, and laid him on the altar upon the wood.
target_text: e rau sa lako mai ki na vanua sa lesia na kalou. sa tara nai cabocabo ni soro o eparaama ka tuva na buka. sa vivigi aisake na luvena ka vakacabora ena i cabocabo ni soro ena dela ni buka sa tuvai tu.

source_text: and abraham stretched forth his hand, and took the knife to slay his son.
target_text: o eparaama sa dodoka na ligana ka taura nai sele, me vakamatea nai soro (luvena).

source_text: and the angel of the lord called unto him out of heaven, and said, abraham, abraham: and he said, here am i.
target_text: na agilosi i jiova sa kaci mai lomalagi ka vaka: "eparaama i eparaama! " sa sauma yani, "sai au oqo. "

source_text: and he said, lay not thine hand upon the lad, neither do thou any thing unto him: for now i know that thou fearest god, seeing thou hast not withheld thy son, thine only son from me.
target_text: sa tukuna mai na agilosi, "kua ni vakamatea na gone, se cakava vua e dua na ka, ni oqo, au sa kila ni o sa rerevaka na kalou â€œni o sa sega ni via maroroya na luvemu, na luvemu tagane e dua ga, mai vei au. "

source_text: and abraham lifted up his eyes, and looked, and behold behind him a ram caught in a thicket by his horns: and abraham went and took the ram, and offered him up for a burnt offering in the stead of his son.
target_text: sa rai cake o eparaama, ka raica e dua na lami sa tacori tu na nona i leu ena dua na veico e dakuna. sa kauta mai o eparaama ka vakacabora mei sosomi kei aisake na luvena mei soro kama.

source_text: and abraham called the name of that place jehovahjireh: as it is said to this day, in the mount of the lord it shall be seen.
