source_text: and jacob's anger was kindled against rachel: and he said, am i in god's stead, who hath withheld from thee the fruit of the womb?
target_text: sa cudru vakalevu o jekope ena vuku i raijeli, sa tukuna kina, "o au beka na kalou ni o koya ga e lewa na vakaluveni, ni o koya ga e sogota tiko na nomu bola ni gone? "

source_text: and she said, behold my maid bilhah, go in unto her; and she shall bear upon my knees, that i may also have children by her.
target_text: sa tukuna mai o raijeli, "oqo o bila na noqu dauveiqaravi, vakacurumi iko vua me vakasucuma kina e dua na gone e duruqu, me dua kina na luvequ mai vua. "

source_text: and she gave him bilhah her handmaid to wife: and jacob went in unto her.
target_text: sa soli bila vua, ka sa curumi koya sara o jekope.

source_text: and bilhah conceived, and bare jacob a son.
target_text: sa kunekune o bila, ka vakasucuma vei jekope e dua na tagane.

source_text: and rachel said, god hath judged me, and hath also heard my voice, and hath given me a son: therefore called she his name dan.
target_text: sa tukuna o raijeli, "sa vakatulewa vei au na kalou; sa rogoca talega o koya na domoqu ka solia vei au e dua na gone. " sa vakayacani koya kina me o tani.

source_text: and bilhah rachel's maid conceived again, and bare jacob a second son.
target_text: sa kunekune tale na dauveiqaravi nei raijeli, o bila, sa vakasucuma vei jekope nai karua ni luvena.

source_text: and rachel said, with great wrestlings have i wrestled with my sister, and i have prevailed: and she called his name naphtali.
target_text: sa tukuna o raijeli, "au sa veiqati vakalevu kei na tuakaqu ia, au sa toso tikoga. " sa vakayacana na gone me o navitalai.

source_text: when leah saw that she had left bearing, she took zilpah her maid, and gave her jacob to wife.
target_text: o lia, ni sa sega tiko ni dua tale na luvena, sa tauri siliva na nona dauveiqaravi ka solia vei jekope me curumi koya.

source_text: and zilpah leah's maid bare jacob a son.
target_text: o siliva sa vakasucuma vei jekope e dua na tagane.

source_text: and leah said, a troop cometh: and she called his name gad.
target_text: sa tukuna o lia, "sa lako tiko mai na mataivalu. " sa vakayacana me o kata.

source_text: and zilpah leah's maid bare jacob a second son.
target_text: o siliva sa vakasucuma nai karua ni luvei jekope.

source_text: and leah said, happy am i, for the daughters will call me blessed: and she called his name asher.
target_text: sa tukuna o lia, "au sa marau, ni ra na tukuna vei au na goneyalewa na dauveivakalouvinakataki. " sa vakayacani koya kina me o aseri.

source_text: and reuben went in the days of wheat harvest, and found mandrakes in the field, and brought them unto his mother leah. then rachel said to leah, give me, i pray thee, of thy son's mandrakes.
target_text: o rupeni sa lako yani ena gauna ni tatamusuki, ka sa kunea mai e so na wainimate ni moce, ka sa kauta sara mai vei tinana. sa kerekere yani o raijeli vei lia ka vaka: "au kerea e so na wai ni moce nei rupeni. "

source_text: and she said unto her, is it a small matter that thou hast taken my husband? and wouldest thou take away my son's mandrakes also? and rachel said, therefore he shall lie with thee to night for thy son's mandrakes.
target_text: sa sauma mai o lia, "e se lailai vei iko o jekope na watiqu? oqo, o sa vinakata tale na wai ni moce nei luvequ talega? " sa sauma yani o raijeli, "drau moce vata mada ena bogi oqo, mei sosomi ni wai ni moce oqori. "

source_text: and jacob came out of the field in the evening, and leah went out to meet him, and said, thou must come in unto me; for surely i have hired thee with my son's mandrakes. and he lay with her that night.
target_text: ni sa lesu mai o jekope mai na veiwere ena yakavi, sa lako yani o lisa ka tukuna vua, "mo mai curu vei au, ni sa o saumi oti ena wai ni moce nei luvequ. " e rau sa mai veimoceri ena bogi o ya.

source_text: and god hearkened unto leah, and she conceived, and bare jacob the fifth son.
target_text: na kalou sa rogoci lia, sa kunekune ka vakasucuma vei jekope nai ka lima ni luvena tagane.

source_text: and leah said, god hath given me my hire, because i have given my maiden to my husband: and she called his name issachar.
target_text: sa tukuna kina o lia, "na kalou sa solia vei au na kequ i voli, ni'u sa solia na noqu dauveiqaravi vei watiqu. " sa vakayacani koya kina me o isakari.

source_text: and leah conceived again, and bare jacob the sixth son.
target_text: sa kunekune tale o lia, ka sa vakasucuma nai ka ono ni luvena vei jekope.

source_text: and leah said, god hath endued me with a good dowry; now will my husband dwell with me, because i have born him six sons: and she called his name zebulun.
target_text: sa tukuna o lia, "na kalou sa vakatikora vei au na veika vivinaka, oqo sa na tikoga kina vata kei au o na watiqu, baleta ni'u sa vakasucuma vua e ono na luvena tagane. " sa vakayacani koya kina me o sevuloni.

source_text: and afterwards she bare a daughter, and called her name dinah.
target_text: sa qai vakasucuma tale e dua na luvena yalewa, ka vakayacani koya me o taina.

source_text: and god remembered rachel, and god hearkened to her, and opened her womb.
target_text: na kalou sa qai nanumi raijeli, sa rogoci koya ka dolava na nona kato ni gone.

source_text: and she conceived, and bare a son; and said, god hath taken away my reproach:
target_text: sa kunekune ka vakasucuma e dua na tagane, ka tukuna, "na kalou sa kauta tani na noqu rogorogo ca. "

source_text: and she called his name joseph; and said, the lord shall add to me another son.
target_text: sa vakayacani koya me o joseva ka tukuna kina, "o jiova ena solia tale vei au e dua na luvequ tagane. "

source_text: and it came to pass, when rachel had born joseph, that jacob said unto laban, send me away, that i may go unto mine own place, and to my country.
target_text: ni sa vakasucumi joseva oti o raijeli, sa tukuna o jekope vei lepani, "laivi au me'u lako, me'u lako ki na noqu tikina, ki na noqu vanua.

source_text: give me my wives and my children, for whom i have served thee, and let me go: for thou knowest my service which i have done thee.
target_text: "soli ira vei au na watiqu, kei ira na luvequ, o ira, au sa qaravi iko kina, ka laivi keimami me keimami lako, o sa kila talega na veiqaravi au sa cakava vei iko. "

source_text: and laban said unto him, i pray thee, if i have found favour in thine eyes, tarry: for i have learned by experience that the lord hath blessed me for thy sake.
target_text: sa tukuna vua o lepani, "mo tiko mada, kevaka au sa kune loloma e matamu, ni'u sa kila ka vulica ni o jiova sa vakalouvinakataki au ena vukumu. "

source_text: and he said, appoint me thy wages, and i will give it.
target_text: sa qai tukuna tale yani, "tukuna vei au na kemu i sau, au na solia vei iko. "

source_text: and he said unto him, thou knowest how i have served thee, and how thy cattle was with me.
target_text: sa tukuna vua o jekope, "o sa kila vinaka na noqu qaravi iko kei na qaravi ni nomu manumanu.

source_text: for it was little which thou hadst before i came, and it is now increased unto a multitude; and the lord hath blessed thee since my coming: and now when shall i provide for mine own house also?
target_text: "na veika e a tu vei iko e liu ni se bera na noqu lako mai, e lailai oqo sa levu sara; na kalou sa vakalouvinakataki iko mai na gauna au a lako mai kina. oqo au na vakania talega na noqu vale ena gauna cava? "

source_text: and he said, what shall i give thee? and jacob said, thou shalt not give me any thing: if thou wilt do this thing for me, i will again feed and keep thy flock.
target_text: sa tukuna mai o lepani, "na cava me'u solia vei iko? " sa sauma mai o jekope, "kua ni solia vei au e dua na ka, au na tiko tale me'u veiqaravi, kevaka o solia vei au na ka:

source_text: i will pass through all thy flock to day, removing from thence all the speckled and spotted cattle, and all the brown cattle among the sheep, and the spotted and speckled among the goats: and of such shall be my hire.
target_text: "me'u lako mada yani ki na qele ni manumanu ena siga oqo, na manumanu kece sa tavutonotono me wasei mai na kena e dravu. na sipi, na lami, na me, oqori me kequ i sau.

source_text: so shall my righteousness answer for me in time to come, when it shall come for my hire before thy face: every one that is not speckled and spotted among the goats, and brown among the sheep, that shall be counted stolen with me.
target_text: "ena saumi vei au na noqu yalododonu na veisiga ni mataka, ni sa lako mai vei iko na kequ i sau. na manumanu kece sa sega ni tavutonotono ena kedra maliwa na me, ka dravu vei ira na lami, era na kilai me sa ka butakoci, kevaka era sa kune vei au. "

source_text: and laban said, behold, i would it might be according to thy word.
target_text: sa tukuna o lepani, "io, oqori sa na vaka na nomu vosa! "

source_text: and he removed that day the he goats that were ringstraked and spotted, and all the she goats that were speckled and spotted, and every one that had some white in it, and all the brown among the sheep, and gave them into the hand of his sons.
target_text: ena siga o ya sa kauta tani na me tagane kece sa tavutonotono, kei na me yalewa kece sa tavutonotono, o ira kece sa via vulavula tiko, kei na ka dravu kece vei ira na lami, sa solia yani ki na ligadra na luvena.

source_text: and he set three days' journey betwixt himself and jacob: and jacob fed the rest of laban's flocks.
target_text: sa lako yani vakayawa mai vei jekope. (me vaka na yawa, ni lakovi ena tolu na siga). o jekope sa vakania tiko na vo ni manumanu i lepani.

source_text: and jacob took him rods of green poplar, and of the hazel and chesnut tree; and pilled white strakes in them, and made the white appear which was in the rods.
target_text: o jekope ka taura tiko na taba ni kau drokadroka mai na amodi kei na jesinati. sa vocia na kulini kau me laurai mai na vulavula ni kau e loma.

source_text: and he set the rods which he had pilled before the flocks in the gutters in the watering troughs when the flocks came to drink, that they should conceive when they came to drink.
target_text: na kau kece sa voci veilutuki, sa cuva tiko mai na mata ni wai ena vanua era dau lako yani kina na manumanu me ra gunu. me ra kunekune kina ni ra sa mai gunu.

source_text: and the flocks conceived before the rods, and brought forth cattle ringstraked, speckled, and spotted.
target_text: era sa kunekune ena mata ni kau sa voci tu. na manumanu kece era sa vakasucuma mai na ka tavutonotono.

source_text: and jacob did separate the lambs, and set the faces of the flocks toward the ringstraked, and all the brown in the flock of laban; and he put his own flocks by themselves, and put them not unto laban's cattle.
target_text: o jekope sa wasei ira na lami, na manumanu kece me ra sa raica tikoga na kau sa voci tu, o ira talega na ka dravu ena qele ni manumanu nei lepani. era sa tiko tani ga na nona manumanu mai vei ira na manumanu nei lepani.

source_text: and it came to pass, whensoever the stronger cattle did conceive, that jacob laid the rods before the eyes of the cattle in the gutters, that they might conceive among the rods.
target_text: sa yaco tiko ga na gauna, ni ra sa kunekune tiko mai na manumanu, o jekope sa biuta tiko ga e matada na kau sa voci oti tu. mera kunekune tiko ena nodra vakaraica tikoga na kau sa voci oti tu.

source_text: but when the cattle were feeble, he put them not in: so the feebler were laban's, and the stronger jacob's.
target_text: na manumanu sa malumalumu sa biu tani â€œna ka kaukauwa sa nei jekope kei na ka malumalumu sa nei lepani.

source_text: and the man increased exceedingly, and had much cattle, and maidservants, and menservants, and camels, and asses.
target_text: o jekope sa tamata kaukauwa sara ka tamata yaco, sa levu na nona manumanu, sa levu na nona dauveiqaravi yalewa kei na tagane, sa levu sara na nona kameli kei na nona asa.

source_text: and he heard the words of laban's sons, saying, jacob hath taken away all that was our father's; and of that which was our father's hath he gotten all this glory.
target_text: sa rogoca o jekope na nodra vosa na luvei lepani ka vaka: "o jekope sa kauta kece na vei ka sa nei tamada, sa rawata na nona i yau, mai na veika ga sa nei tamada. "

source_text: and jacob beheld the countenance of laban, and, behold, it was not toward him as before.
target_text: o jekope sa raica tiko na veitokoni nei lepani vua sa vaka e sega ni vinaka mai me vaka e liu.

source_text: and the lord said unto jacob, return unto the land of thy fathers, and to thy kindred; and i will be with thee.
target_text: o jiova sa tukuna vei jekope, "mo lesu tale ki nomu vanua, vei ira na wekamu, au na tiko vata kei iko. "

source_text: and jacob sent and called rachel and leah to the field unto his flock,
target_text: o jekope sa kacivi raijeli yani kei lia ki na buca ena vanua era sa tiko kina na manumanu,

source_text: and said unto them, i see your father's countenance, that it is not toward me as before; but the god of my father hath been with me.
target_text: sa tukuna vei rau, "au sa raica na nona veitokoni o tamamudrau â€œni sa sega ni vinaka me vaka e liu, ia, na kalou i tamaqu sa tiko vata kei au.

source_text: and ye know that with all my power i have served your father.
target_text: "drau sa kila talega, au sa qarava na tamamudrau ena noqu kaukauwa kece.

source_text: and your father hath deceived me, and changed my wages ten times; but god suffered him not to hurt me.
target_text: "ia, o tamamudrau sa vakaisini au ena nona veisautaka na kequ i sau vaka tini, ia, na kalou sa sega ni vakatarai koya me vakacacani au.

source_text: if he said thus, the speckled shall be thy wages; then all the cattle bare speckled: and if he said thus, the ringstraked shall be thy hire; then bare all the cattle ringstraked.
target_text: "kevaka sa tukuna vaka oqo, 'na tavutonotono sa kemu i sau' â€œera na tavutonotono kece. kevaka sa tukuna, 'na roka veimama ena kemu i sau' â€œera na roka veimama kece.

source_text: thus god hath taken away the cattle of your father, and given them to me.
target_text: "na kalou sa kauta tani na manumanu kece i tamamudrau ka solia mai vei au.

source_text: and it came to pass at the time that the cattle conceived, that i lifted up mine eyes, and saw in a dream, and, behold, the rams which leaped upon the cattle were ringstraked, speckled, and grisled.
target_text: "sa yaco ena gauna era sa kunekune kina na manumanu, au sa raica ena tadra na luve ni me era sa ladelade tiko â€œera sa veivolavolai kece tu ka tavutonotono.

source_text: and the angel of god spake unto me in a dream, saying, jacob: and i said, here am i.
target_text: "na agilosi ni kalou sa vosa vei au ena tadra ka tukuna, 'jekope', sa saumi mai, 'sai au oqo. '

source_text: and he said, lift up now thine eyes, and see, all the rams which leap upon the cattle are ringstraked, speckled, and grisled: for i have seen all that laban doeth unto thee.
target_text: "na agilosi sa tukuna mai, 'mo raica, na lami kecega sa rika tiko era sa volavolai ka tavutonotono, au sa raica na veika kecega sa cakava o lepani, sa caka ga ena vukumudrau.

source_text: i am the god of bethel, where thou anointedst the pillar, and where thou vowedst a vow unto me: now arise, get thee out from this land, and return unto the land of thy kindred.
target_text: 'oi au na kalou kei peceli â€œna vanua o a lumuta kina na duru ka cakava kina na bubului vei au. mo tucake, ka lako tani mai na vanua oqo, ka lesu ki na vanua e nodra na wekamu dina. '"

source_text: and rachel and leah answered and said unto him, is there yet any portion or inheritance for us in our father's house?
target_text: o raijeli kei lia e rau sa sauma vua ka vaka: "e se vo tale tiko e so nai votavota e neirau mai na vale nei tamai keirau?

source_text: are we not counted of him strangers? for he hath sold us, and hath quite devoured also our money.
target_text: "keirau sa sega beka ni vulagi mai vua, ni sa volitaki keirau ka sa kania kece na neirau i lavo?

source_text: for all the riches which god hath taken from our father, that is ours, and our children's: now then, whatsoever god hath said unto thee, do.
target_text: "ni sai yau sa taura kece na kalou mai vei tamai keirau sa neirau kei ira kece na luvei keirau; oqo, na veika ga sa tukuna vei iko na kalou, mo cakava. "

source_text: then jacob rose up, and set his sons and his wives upon camels;
target_text: o jekope sa vakavodoki ira na luvena kei na watina ena kameli.

source_text: and he carried away all his cattle, and all his goods which he had gotten, the cattle of his getting, which he had gotten in padanaram, for to go to isaac his father in the land of canaan.
target_text: sa kauta talega na nona manumanu kece kei na veika kece e taukena, na veika kece e sa rawata mai padani-erami, ka lako vei aisake na tamana ena vanua o kenani.

source_text: and laban went to shear his sheep: and rachel had stolen the images that were her father's.
target_text: o lepani e se lako tu me kotiva na nona sipi â€œo raijeli sa butakoca mai na matakau ni vuvale e nei tamana.

source_text: and jacob stole away unawares to laban the syrian, in that he told him not that he fled.
target_text: sa dro yani o jekope, ka sa sega ni kila o lepani na kai siria ni sa sega ni via tukuna vua.

source_text: so he fled with all that he had; and he rose up, and passed over the river, and set his face toward the mount gilead.
target_text: sa dro yani kei na ka kece sa tu vua, sa takosova yani na wai ka lako vaka ki na veiulunivanua e kiliati.

source_text: and it was told laban on the third day that jacob was fled.
target_text: ena i katolu ni siga sa tukuni vei lepani ni sa dro o jekope.

source_text: and he took his brethren with him, and pursued after him seven days' journey; and they overtook him in the mount gilead.
target_text: sa kauti ira na nona ka cici muri jekope me vitu na siga, sa qai yaco vei ira ena veiulunivanua mai kiliati.

source_text: and god came to laban the syrian in a dream by night, and said unto him, take heed that thou speak not to jacob either good or bad.
target_text: na kalou sa lako mai vei lepani ena bogi ena tadra ka tukuna vua, "qarauni iko, mo lewa vinaka na nomu vosa vei jekope. "

source_text: then laban overtook jacob. now jacob had pitched his tent in the mount: and laban with his brethren pitched in the mount of gilead.
target_text: sa yaco yani o lepani vei jekope ni se qai vakaduria tiko na nona veivale laca ena veiulunivanua e kiliati.

source_text: and laban said to jacob, what hast thou done, that thou hast stolen away unawares to me, and carried away my daughters, as captives taken with the sword?
target_text: sa tukuna o lepani vei jekope, "na cava o sa cakava, ni o sa lako vakavuni tani mai vei au, o sa kauti rau tani na luvequ me vaka na bobula e na i seleiwau?

source_text: wherefore didst thou flee away secretly, and steal away from me; and didst not tell me, that i might have sent thee away with mirth, and with songs, with tabret, and with harp?
target_text: "na cava o sa dro kina vakavuni ka sega ni tukuna vei au, me'u veitalatala vinaka vei iko ena marau kei na lagasere kei na tibereli na api?

source_text: and hast not suffered me to kiss my sons and my daughters? thou hast now done foolishly in so doing.
target_text: "o sa sega ni vakatara me'u reguci ira na luvequ tagane kei na luvequ yalewa. o sa cakacaka vakalialia.

source_text: it is in the power of my hand to do you hurt: but the god of your father spake unto me yesternight, saying, take thou heed that thou speak not to jacob either good or bad.
target_text: "sa tu vei au na kaukauwa me'u veitotogitaki, ia, na kalou i tamamu sa vosa vei au ena bogi ka tukuna, 'qarauni iko vinaka, ni o sa vosa vei jekope. '

source_text: and now, though thou wouldest needs be gone, because thou sore longedst after thy father's house, yet wherefore hast thou stolen my gods?
target_text: "o sa lako dina mai oqo, baleta ni o sa via lako ki na vale nei tamamu, ia, na cava ga o butakoca mai kina na noqu kalou-matakau? "

source_text: and jacob answered and said to laban, because i was afraid: for i said, peradventure thou wouldest take by force thy daughters from me.
target_text: sa sauma o jekope, "au sa rere baleta, 'de o na qai tauri rau tale vakaukauwa na luvemu yalewa. '

source_text: with whomsoever thou findest thy gods, let him not live: before our brethren discern thou what is thine with me, and take it to thee. for jacob knew not that rachel had stolen them.
target_text: "vei koya o sa raica vua na nomu kaloumatakau, me kua ni bula o koya. ena matadra na tamata, mo vakatakilakilataka na ka e nomu ka taura yani. " o jekope sa sega ni kila ni sa kauta mai o raijeli na ka o ya.

source_text: and laban went into jacob's tent, and into leah's tent, and into the two maidservants' tents; but he found them not. then went he out of leah's tent, and entered into rachel's tent.
target_text: sa lako yani o lepani ki na vale laca nei jekope, nei lia, nodrau na dauveiqaravi, sa sega ga ni kunea na kalou-matakau. sa lako yani ki na vale laca nei raijeli.

source_text: now rachel had taken the images, and put them in the camel's furniture, and sat upon them. and laban searched all the tent, but found them not.
target_text: o raijeli sa biuta na kalou-matakau oqo ena i dabedabe ni ose ka qai dabeca yani. sa vakasaqaqara o lepani ena loma ni vale â€œka sa sega ga ni kunea.

source_text: and she said to her father, let it not displease my lord that i cannot rise up before thee; for the custom of women is upon me. and he searched, but found not the images.
target_text: sa tukuna yani vei tamana, "me kua ni ca vua na noqu turaga ni'u sa sega ni tucake rawa, ni sa se tiko na rosi me vaka sa dauyacovi ira ga na yalewa â€œsa yaco vei au oqo. " sa vakasaqaqara, ia, sa sega ga ni kunea na kaloumatakau.

source_text: and jacob was wroth, and chode with laban: and jacob answered and said to laban, what is my trespass? what is my sin, that thou hast so hotly pursued after me?
target_text: sa cudru vakalevu o jekope ka sa vosa vakaukauwa vei lepani ka vaka: "na cava au cala kina vei iko, na cava na noqu i valavala ca, mo cicivi au kina vaka oqo?

source_text: whereas thou hast searched all my stuff, what hast thou found of all thy household stuff? set it here before my brethren and thy brethren, that they may judge betwixt us both.
target_text: "o sa vakaraica kece na noqu veika au taukena, na cava e nomu o sa kunea? biuta e mataqu oqo me ra vakatulewa kina o ira kece oqo e matadaru!

source_text: this twenty years have i been with thee; thy ewes and thy she goats have not cast their young, and the rams of thy flock have i not eaten.
target_text: "e ruasagavulu na yabaki oqo au sa tiko vata kei iko, na nomu sipi kei na nomu me e se sega vakadua ni bau vakalutuka na luvena, au se sega talega ni kania e dua na luve ni me mai na kedra bai.

source_text: that which was torn of beasts i brought not unto thee; i bare the loss of it; of my hand didst thou require it, whether stolen by day, or stolen by night.
target_text: "o ira mada ga era sa basuraki mai vei ira na manumanu kila au sa sega ni kauta mai vei iko, au sa vakaisosomitaka ga na ka sa yali. o sa vinakata ga mai na ligaqu se era butakoci ena siga se ena bogi.

source_text: thus i was; in the day the drought consumed me, and the frost by night; and my sleep departed from mine eyes.
target_text: "au sa tiko ga kei ira, ena siga sa kani au na katakata, ena bogi na batabata-liliwa, na noqu moce ni vakacegui sa drovaka na mataqu.

source_text: thus have i been twenty years in thy house; i served thee fourteen years for thy two daughters, and six years for thy cattle: and thou hast changed my wages ten times.
target_text: "au sa tiko ena nomu vale me ruasagavulu na yabaki, au qaravi iko me tinikava na yabaki ena vukudrau na luvemu yalewa, ka ono tale na yabaki ena vukudra na manumanu ka o sa veisautaka na kequ i sau vaka tini na gauna.

source_text: except the god of my father, the god of abraham, and the fear of isaac, had been with me, surely thou hadst sent me away now empty. god hath seen mine affliction and the labour of my hands, and rebuked thee yesternight.
target_text: "baleta ni sa tiko vata kei au na kalou i tamaqu, na kalou i eparaama, na rerevaki i aisake â€œe dina, o na vakatalai au tani ena liga lala. na kalou sa raica na noqu vakararawataki kei na cakacaka ni ligaqu, ka sa vunauci iko ena bogi. "

source_text: and laban answered and said unto jacob, these daughters are my daughters, and these children are my children, and these cattle are my cattle, and all that thou seest is mine: and what can i do this day unto these my daughters, or unto their children which they have born?
target_text: sa vosa o lepani vei jekope, "oi rau na yalewa oqo e rau sa noqu, o ira na gone oqo era sa noqu, na manumanu kece oqo sa noqu, na ka kece o raica sa noqu. ia, na cava me'u cakava vei rau na luvequ yalewa oqo kei ira na luvedrau?

source_text: now therefore come thou, let us make a covenant, i and thou; and let it be for a witness between me and thee.
target_text: "lako mai me daru veiyalayalati mada, o iko kei au, me i vakadinadina ena kedaru maliwa. "

source_text: and jacob took a stone, and set it up for a pillar.
target_text: sa vakaduria o jekope e dua na duru vatu.

source_text: and jacob said unto his brethren, gather stones; and they took stones, and made an heap: and they did eat there upon the heap.
target_text: sa tukuna o jekope vei ira na tamata, "mo ni tomi vatu mai, " era sa binia mai ka kana ena dela ni binibini vatu.

source_text: and laban called it jegarsahadutha: but jacob called it galeed.
target_text: o lepani sa vakayacana me jeka-saaduca, ia, o jekope sa vakayacana me kaliti.

source_text: and laban said, this heap is a witness between me and thee this day. therefore was the name of it called galeed;
target_text: sa tukuna o lepani, "nai binibini vatu oqo sai vakadinadina vei kedaru ena siga oqo. " sa vakayacani kina me o kaliti,

source_text: and mizpah; for he said, the lord watch between me and thee, when we are absent one from another.
target_text: o misipa talega, baleta ni sa tukuna, "me raica tiko mai o jiova ena kedaru maliwa, ni daru sa dui tikotiko.

source_text: if thou shalt afflict my daughters, or if thou shalt take other wives beside my daughters, no man is with us; see, god is witness betwixt me and thee.
target_text: "kevaka o sa vakararawataki rau na luvequ, se o sa taura tale e so na watimu, sa sega na tamata meâ€ raica na kalou ga sai vakadinadina vei kedaru! "

source_text: and laban said to jacob, behold this heap, and behold this pillar, which i have cast betwixt me and thee:
target_text: sa tukuna o lepani vei jekope. "oqo nai binibini vatu kei na duru, sa tu oqo ena kedaru maliwa.

source_text: this heap be witness, and this pillar be witness, that i will not pass over this heap to thee, and that thou shalt not pass over this heap and this pillar unto me, for harm.
target_text: "oqo nai vakadinadina, nai binibini vatu kei na duru, au na sega ni lako sivia nai binibini oqo ki vei iko, se, mo lako sivia mai nai binibini oqo ki vei au, me ia na veivakacacani.

source_text: the god of abraham, and the god of nahor, the god of their father, judge betwixt us. and jacob sware by the fear of his father isaac.
target_text: "na kalou nei eparaama, na kalou nei neori, na kalou nei tamadrau me mai lewa ena kedaru maliwa. " o jekope sa bubului vei koya na rerevaki i aisake na tamana.

source_text: then jacob offered sacrifice upon the mount, and called his brethren to eat bread: and they did eat bread, and tarried all night in the mount.
target_text: sa vakacabora o jekope nai soro ena ulunivanua, ka sa kacivi ira mai na tamata me ra mai kana. era sa kana madrai ka tiko ena ulunivanua me yacova na mataka.

source_text: and early in the morning laban rose up, and kissed his sons and his daughters, and blessed them: and laban departed, and returned unto his place.
target_text: ena mataka lailai, sa tucake o lepani ka reguci ira na gone kei rau na luvena yalewa ka vosa vakalouvinakataki ira. sa lako o lepani ka lesu tale ki nona vanua.

source_text: and jacob went on his way, and the angels of god met him.
target_text: sa lako yani ena sala o jekope ka sa sota kei ira na agilosi ni kalou.

source_text: and when jacob saw them, he said, this is god's host: and he called the name of that place mahanaim.
target_text: ni sa raici ira o jekope, sa tukuna, "oqo nai tikotiko ni kalou, " ka sa vakatoka na yaca ni vanua o ya, me maenaimi.

source_text: and jacob sent messengers before him to esau his brother unto the land of seir, the country of edom.
target_text: o jekope sa vakatala eso na mata vei iso na tacina ena vanua nei sia e itomi.

source_text: and he commanded them, saying, thus shall ye speak unto my lord esau; thy servant jacob saith thus, i have sojourned with laban, and stayed there until now:
target_text: sa vakarota vei ira ka vaka, "mo ni vosa vei iso na noqu turaga ka vaka, 'sa tukuna na nomuni tamata o jekope, "au a tiko mai vei lepani ka yacova oqo.

source_text: and i have oxen, and asses, flocks, and menservants, and womenservants: and i have sent to tell my lord, that i may find grace in thy sight.
target_text: "sa tu vei au na bulumakau, na asa, na sipi kei na me, na dauveiqaravi tagane kei na yalewa, au sa talatala yani me tukuni vua na noqu turaga, me'u kune loloma kina e matamuni. "'"

source_text: and the messengers returned to jacob, saying, we came to thy brother esau, and also he cometh to meet thee, and four hundred men with him.
target_text: era sa lesu tale mai vei jekope na i talaki ka tukuna, "keitou sa lesu mai vei iso, ka sa lako tiko mai o koya me mai sotavi iko. e va na drau na tamata sa tiko vata kei koya. "

source_text: then jacob was greatly afraid and distressed: and he divided the people that was with him, and the flocks, and herds, and the camels, into two bands;
target_text: sa rere ka taqaya vakalevu o jekope, ka sa wasei ira na tamata sa tiko vata kei koya, na sipi kei na bulumakau kei na kameli, me rua nai wasewase.

source_text: and said, if esau come to the one company, and smite it, then the other company which is left shall escape.
target_text: sa tukuna sara, "kevaka sa lakova mai o iso ka valuta e dua nai wasewase, me dro yani nai wasewase ka dua. "

source_text: and jacob said, o god of my father abraham, and god of my father isaac, the lord which saidst unto me, return unto thy country, and to thy kindred, and i will deal well with thee:
target_text: sa tukuna tale o jekope, "na kalou nei tamaqu o eparaama, na kalou nei aisake na tamaqu, na kalou o koya sa tukuna vei au, 'lesu tale ki na nomu vanua, vei ira na wekamu, ka au na cakacaka vata kei iko':

source_text: i am not worthy of the least of all the mercies, and of all the truth, which thou hast shewed unto thy servant; for with my staff i passed over this jordan; and now i am become two bands.
target_text: "ssa sega ni ganiti au na loloma kece kei na dina kece o ni sa vakaraitaka vei au na nomuni tamata. au a takosova mai na joritani kei na noqu i titoko â€œia, oqo au sa yaco me rua nai vavakoso levu.

source_text: deliver me, i pray thee, from the hand of my brother, from the hand of esau: for i fear him, lest he will come and smite me, and the mother with the children.
target_text: "mo ni vakabulai au mai na ligai koya na taciqu, mai na ligai iso; ni'u sa rerevaki koya, de qai vala kei au kei ira na gone kei ira na tinadra.

source_text: and thou saidst, i will surely do thee good, and make thy seed as the sand of the sea, which cannot be numbered for multitude.
target_text: "ni kemuni sa tukuna, 'au na raica mo na vinaka, ka cakava na nomu kawa me vaka na nuku ni wasawasa, ni sa sega ni wiliki rawa na kena levu. '"

source_text: and he lodged there that same night; and took of that which came to his hand a present for esau his brother;
target_text: sa moce mai kea ena bogi, ka taura na veika sa lako mai ligana â€œme ka ni loloma vei iso na tacina:

source_text: two hundred she goats, and twenty he goats, two hundred ewes, and twenty rams,
target_text: e rua na drau na me yalewa, ruasagavulu na me tagane, ruanadrau na sipi yalewa kei na ruasagavulu na sipi tagane,

source_text: thirty milch camels with their colts, forty kine, and ten bulls, twenty she asses, and ten foals.
target_text: e tolusagavulu na kameli yalewa kei na luvedra, vasagavulu na bulumakau yalewa ka tini na bulumakau tagane (yadru), ruasagavulu na asa yalewa kei na tini na kena ka tagane.

source_text: and he delivered them into the hand of his servants, every drove by themselves; and said unto his servants, pass over before me, and put a space betwixt drove and drove.
target_text: sa solia yani ki na ligadra na nona tamata ka tukuna vei ira, "dou liu yani, ka me dua na veiyawaki ena keda maliwa. "

source_text: and he commanded the foremost, saying, when esau my brother meeteth thee, and asketh thee, saying, whose art thou? and whither goest thou? and whose are these before thee?
target_text: sa vakarota vei ira sa liu, "kevaka sa sotavi kemuni o iso ka tarogi kemuni, 'o ni sa nei cei? o ni na lako tiko ki vei? e nei cei na veika sa tu oqo? '

source_text: then thou shalt say, they be thy servant jacob's; it is a present sent unto my lord esau: and, behold, also he is behind us.
target_text: "mo ni qai tukuna, 'oqo era sa nona na nomuni tamata o jekope. oqo sa soli tiko mai me nona ka ni loloma vua na noqu turaga o iso; o koya talega sa muri tiko mai. '"

source_text: and so commanded he the second, and the third, and all that followed the droves, saying, on this manner shall ye speak unto esau, when ye find him.
target_text: sa vakarota talega nai karua ni lawalawa kei nai katolu ka vaka: "me vaka talega oqori na veika mo ni tukuna vei iso ni kemuni sa kunei koya;

source_text: and say ye moreover, behold, thy servant jacob is behind us. for he said, i will appease him with the present that goeth before me, and afterward i will see his face; peradventure he will accept of me.
target_text: "mo ni tukuna talega, 'raica na nomuni tamata o jekope sa muri tiko mai. '" ni sa tukuna mai o koya, "nai solisoli oqo ena vinaka vua ka ni oti oqori au na raici koya e mataqu; de na qai ciqomi au kina. "

source_text: so went the present over before him: and himself lodged that night in the company.
target_text: sa liu sara vua nai solisoli oqori, ia, o koya e se bogi dua tale ena vanua era cegu tiko kina.

source_text: and he rose up that night, and took his two wives, and his two womenservants, and his eleven sons, and passed over the ford jabbok.
target_text: sa tucake o jekope ena bogi ka kauti rau na watina, rau na dauveiqaravi kei ira na luvena e tinikadua, ka takosovi japoki.

source_text: and he took them, and sent them over the brook, and sent over that he had.
target_text: sa kauti ira ka vakatalai ira yani ki tai kadua, ka vakauta talega yani na veika sa tu vua.

source_text: and jacob was left alone; and there wrestled a man with him until the breaking of the day.
target_text: sa tiko duadua ga o jekope, sa dua na tamata e rau sa veimulomulo kaya me yacova na kida ni mataka.

source_text: and when he saw that he prevailed not against him, he touched the hollow of his thigh; and the hollow of jacob's thigh was out of joint, as he wrestled with him.
target_text: na tamata oqo, ni sa raica ni sa sega ni rawa ni gumatua vei jekope, sa qai boboka na veiuturi ni sema ni sui ni dibina. oqo sa lutu kina nai sema ni dibina ni rau sa veimulomulo tiko.

source_text: and he said, let me go, for the day breaketh. and he said, i will not let thee go, except thou bless me.
target_text: sa tukuna mai na tamata, "laivi au me'u lako, ni sa kida mai na mataka. " sa sauma o jekope, "mo vakalouvinakataki au sara, au sa na qai laivi iko! "

source_text: and he said unto him, what is thy name? and he said, jacob.
target_text: sa qai tarogi jekope, "o cei na yacamu? " sa sauma yani, "o jekope. "

source_text: and he said, thy name shall be called no more jacob, but israel: for as a prince hast thou power with god and with men, and hast prevailed.
target_text: "sa na sega tale ni yacamu o jekope, sa na yacamu oqo o isireli (sotia ni kalou), ni o sa sasaga tiko ga vua na kalou kei na tamata talega, ka sa gumatua kina. "

source_text: and jacob asked him, and said, tell me, i pray thee, thy name. and he said, wherefore is it that thou dost ask after my name? and he blessed him there.
target_text: o jekope talega sa tarogi koya ka vaka: "o cei na yacamu? " sa sauma mai, "na cava o taroga kina na yacaqu? " sa qai vakalouvinakataki koya mai kea.

source_text: and jacob called the name of the place peniel: for i have seen god face to face, and my life is preserved.
target_text: sa vakatoka na yaca ni vanua o ya o penieli, "au sa raica na kalou ena matana votu ka au se bula tiko ga. "

source_text: and as he passed over penuel the sun rose upon him, and he halted upon his thigh.
target_text: ni se takosovi penieli tiko â€œsa cadra vua na matanisiga ka sa gera na dibina ni lako voli.

source_text: therefore the children of israel eat not of the sinew which shrank, which is upon the hollow of the thigh, unto this day: because he touched the hollow of jacob's thigh in the sinew that shrank.
target_text: me yacova mai nikua, o ira na isireli era sa sega ni kania na lewe ni dibi. baleta na kalou sa tara na dibi i jekope, ka sa (mavule) lutu kina na sui ni dibina.

source_text: and jacob lifted up his eyes, and looked, and, behold, esau came, and with him four hundred men. and he divided the children unto leah, and unto rachel, and unto the two handmaids.
target_text: sa rai yani o jekope, ka raica ni sa lako tiko mai o iso vata kei na va na drau na nona tamata. sa wasewasei ira vakatotolo na gone vei ira na dui tinadra.

source_text: and he put the handmaids and their children foremost, and leah and her children after, and rachel and joseph hindermost.
target_text: sa liu oirau na dauveiqaravi kei ira na luvena, tarava yani o lia kei na luvena, ka muri sara o raijeli kei joseva.

source_text: and he passed over before them, and bowed himself to the ground seven times, until he came near to his brother.
target_text: sa takoso yani o jekope ka cuva ki na qele vakavitu, me yacova ni sa voleka mai vei iso na tacina.

source_text: and esau ran to meet him, and embraced him, and fell on his neck, and kissed him: and they wept.
target_text: ia, o iso sa cici mai ka roqoti koya ka lele yani ki domona ka reguci jekope ka tagi, ni rau sa veitagicaki ena marau.

source_text: and he lifted up his eyes, and saw the women and the children; and said, who are those with thee? and he said, the children which god hath graciously given thy servant.
target_text: sa rai yani o iso, ka sa raici ira na yalewa kei na dui luvedra ka taroga, "o cei o ira oqo? " sa sauma yani, "o ira na gone oqo era sai solisoli ni loloma ni kalou vua na nomuni tamata. "

source_text: then the handmaidens came near, they and their children, and they bowed themselves.
target_text: e rau na lako talega mai na dauveiqaravi kei na luvedra ka cuva sobu.

source_text: and leah also with her children came near, and bowed themselves: and after came joseph near and rachel, and they bowed themselves.
target_text: sa lako talega mai o lia kei ira na luvena ka cuva sobu. ni oti oqo sa lako talega mai o joseva, kei raijeli ka cuva talega.

source_text: and he said, what meanest thou by all this drove which i met? and he said, these are to find grace in the sight of my lord.
target_text: sa taroga mai o iso, "na cava nai balebale ni lawalawa kei oqo keimami sa sota oti? " sa tukuna yani o jekope, "oqori me ra kune loloma kina ena mata ni noqu turaga. "

source_text: and esau said, i have enough, my brother; keep that thou hast unto thyself.
target_text: sa tukuna tale o iso, "sa levu tu vei au na veika, taciqu; maroroya kece oqo me nomu ga. "

source_text: and jacob said, nay, i pray thee, if now i have found grace in thy sight, then receive my present at my hand: for therefore i have seen thy face, as though i had seen the face of god, and thou wast pleased with me.
target_text: sa sauma yani o jekope, "e sega, kevaka au sa kune loloma e matamu, mo ciqoma nai solisoli mai na ligaqu â€œni'u sa raica na matamu ni sa vaka ga ni'u raica na mata ni kalou, ni o sa vinaka vei au.

source_text: take, i pray thee, my blessing that is brought to thee; because god hath dealt graciously with me, and because i have enough. and he urged him, and he took it.
target_text: "au kerea mo taura na veivakalouvinakataki sa kau mai vei kemuni, baleta na kalou sa levu dina na nona yalololoma vei au, ka sa rui levu tale vei au oqo. " sa uqeti koya tikoga o jekope â€œsa mani ciqoma o iso.

source_text: and he said, let us take our journey, and let us go, and i will go before thee.
target_text: sa mani tukuna o iso, "mai me daru lako sara, au na liu tiko vei iko. "

source_text: and he said unto him, my lord knoweth that the children are tender, and the flocks and herds with young are with me: and if men should overdrive them one day, all the flock will die.
target_text: sa sauma yani o jekope, "na noqu turaga sa kila ni ra sa malumalumu na gone, era sa malumalumu talega na manumanu, kevaka me ra na toso tale me dua na siga, era na mate kece.

source_text: let my lord, i pray thee, pass over before his servant: and i will lead on softly, according as the cattle that goeth before me and the children be able to endure, until i come unto my lord unto seir.
target_text: "au kerea, me liu ga yani na noqu turaga, ka me'u na kauti ira ga yani vakamalua na manumanu kei ira na gone ena neimami toso ga, me yacova ni keimami sa yaco yani vua na noqu turaga e sia. "

source_text: and esau said, let me now leave with thee some of the folk that are with me. and he said, what needeth it? let me find grace in the sight of my lord.
target_text: sa tukuna mai o iso, "me'u biuta tiko mai eso na noqu tamata vata kei iko? " sa sauma mai o jekope, "ena dua beka na kedra yaga? me'u kune loloma mai na mata ni noqu turaga. "

source_text: so esau returned that day on his way unto seir.
target_text: sa lesu yani o iso ena siga o ya, ena sala ki sia.

source_text: and jacob journeyed to succoth, and built him an house, and made booths for his cattle: therefore the name of the place is called succoth.
target_text: sa lako yani o jekope ki sakoca, sa tara e dua na nona vale, kei na vale me nodra na manumanu. sa vakayacani kina na vanua o ya me sakoca.

source_text: and jacob came to shalem, a city of shechem, which is in the land of canaan, when he came from padanaram; and pitched his tent before the city.
target_text: sa yaco vinaka mai sikemi o jekope, ena vanua o kenani, ena nona lako mai padanierami; sa vakaduria na nona valelaca ena mata ni koro.

source_text: and he bought a parcel of a field, where he had spread his tent, at the hand of the children of hamor, shechem's father, for an hundred pieces of money.
target_text: sa volia na tiki ni vanua sa mai vakaduria kina na nona vale laca, mai vei ira na luvei emori na tamai sikemi ena rua na drau na dola.

source_text: and he erected there an altar, and called it eleloheisrael.
target_text: sa tara mai kea e dua nai cabocabo ni soro, ka vakatoka me ilai-eloe isireli.

source_text: and dinah the daughter of leah, which she bare unto jacob, went out to see the daughters of the land.
target_text: o taina na luvei lia, o koya sa vakasucuma vei jekope â€œsa lako yani me vakaraici ira na goneyalewa ni vanua.

source_text: and when shechem the son of hamor the hivite, prince of the country, saw her, he took her, and lay with her, and defiled her.
target_text: ni sa raici koya o sikemi, na ravouvou ni vanua o ivaiti, na luvei emori, sa kauti koya, ka moceri koya, ka vakacacani koya.

source_text: and his soul clave unto dinah the daughter of jacob, and he loved the damsel, and spake kindly unto the damsel.
target_text: na yalona sa kabiti taina na luvei jekope, sa domoni taina ka sa vosa vinaka vua.

source_text: and shechem spake unto his father hamor, saying, get me this damsel to wife.
target_text: sa vosa vei emori na tamana o sikemi ka vaka, "mo kauta mai na goneyalewa oqo me watiqu. "

source_text: and jacob heard that he had defiled dinah his daughter: now his sons were with his cattle in the field: and jacob held his peace until they were come.
target_text: sa rogoca o jekope ni sa vakacacani taina na luvena yalewa o sikemi. o ira na luvena tagane era se tu mai na buca vata kei ira na manumanu. sa tiko ga vakamalua o jekope me yacova ni ra sa lesu mai.

source_text: and hamor the father of shechem went out unto jacob to commune with him.
target_text: sa lako yani o emori na tamai sikemi vei jekope me rau veivosaki.

source_text: and the sons of jacob came out of the field when they heard it: and the men were grieved, and they were very wroth, because he had wrought folly in israel in lying with jacob's daughter; which thing ought not to be done.
target_text: era sa lesu mai na luvei jekope tagane mai vanua ka rogoca na ka sa yaco, era sa rarawa sara vakalevu â€œbaleta ni sa cakava na tamata oqo e dua nai valavala toro sobu sara e isireli. ni sa mocera na luvei jekope, e dua na ka e sega ni dodonu me yaco.

source_text: and hamor communed with them, saying, the soul of my son shechem longeth for your daughter: i pray you give her him to wife.
target_text: sa vosa vei ira o emori ka vaka: "na yalo i sikemi na luvequ, sa rui kabita dina na luvemudou yalewa. au kerea mo dou soli koya me watina.

source_text: and make ye marriages with us, and give your daughters unto us, and take our daughters unto you.
target_text: "me da veimusumusuki, ni taura na neimami goneyalewa, ka me keimami taura na nomuni goneyalewa.

source_text: and ye shall dwell with us: and the land shall be before you; dwell and trade ye therein, and get you possessions therein.
target_text: "mo ni tiko vata kei keimami, sa tu oqori na vanua. mo ni tiko kina ka veivoli kina, ka mo ni taura ga na veika o ni vinakata mai kina. "

source_text: and shechem said unto her father and unto her brethren, let me find grace in your eyes, and what ye shall say unto me i will give.
target_text: o sikemi sa tukuna vei jekope kei iratou na ganena, "me'u kune loloma mada mai vei kemudou â€œna veika ga dou sa vinakata, au na solia vei kemudou.

source_text: ask me never so much dowry and gift, and i will give according as ye shall say unto me: but give me the damsel to wife.
target_text: "dou tukuna vei au na cava ga me kena i vakamalua, au na solia vei kemudou. me soli ga na goneyalewa oqo me watiqu. "

source_text: and the sons of jacob answered shechem and hamor his father deceitfully, and said, because he had defiled dinah their sister:
target_text: o iratou na luvei jekope e ratou sa sauma vei sikemi kei emori na tamana, ka vosa vakaukauwa sara baleta ni sa vakacacani na ganedratou o taina.

source_text: and they said unto them, we cannot do this thing, to give our sister to one that is uncircumcised; for that were a reproach unto us:
target_text: e ratou sa tukuna vei rau, "sa sega ni rawa oqo, me soli na neimami yalewa vei ira na sega ni cili, ni oqori sa dua nai valavala ca levu vei keimami.

source_text: but in this will we consent unto you: if ye will be as we be, that every male of you be circumcised;
target_text: "ena ka ga oqo, keimami na yalovinaka kina: o ya mo ni vakataki keimami â€œna nomuni tagane kece me ra cilivi,

source_text: then will we give our daughters unto you, and we will take your daughters to us, and we will dwell with you, and we will become one people.
target_text: "oqori ga keimami na soli ira kina na neimami goneyalewa vei kemuni, ka keimami na tauri ira kina na nomuni goneyalewa, keimami na tiko kina vata kei kemuni, eda na dua ga kina na tamata.

source_text: but if ye will not hearken unto us, to be circumcised; then will we take our daughter, and we will be gone.
target_text: "kevaka o ni sa sega ni rogoca na vosa mo ni cilivi kina, keimami na kauta na luvei keimami goneyalewa ka lako. "

source_text: and their words pleased hamor, and shechem hamor's son.
target_text: na vosa oqo sa vinaka vei emori kei sikemi na luvena.

source_text: and the young man deferred not to do the thing, because he had delight in jacob's daughter: and he was more honourable than all the house of his father.
target_text: o sikemi sa sega ni berabera tale ni cakava na ka sa tukuni vua, baleta ni sa rui domona dina na luvei jekope goneyalewa. o sikemi sa tamata dokai sara ena vale nei tamana.

source_text: and hamor and shechem his son came unto the gate of their city, and communed with the men of their city, saying,
target_text: o emori kei sikemi na luvena tagane, e rau sa lako mai ki na matamata ni koro ka vosa vei ira na tagane kecega ka tukuna:

source_text: these men are peaceable with us; therefore let them dwell in the land, and trade therein; for the land, behold, it is large enough for them; let us take their daughters to us for wives, and let us give them our daughters.
target_text: "o ira na tamata oqo era sa duavata kei keda me ra tiko ena noda vanua ka veivoli kina. ni sa veiraurau na vanua vei ira me da tauri ira na luvedra yalewa me watida ka soli ira na luveda yalewa me watidra.

source_text: only herein will the men consent unto us for to dwell with us, to be one people, if every male among us be circumcised, as they are circumcised.
target_text: "e dua ga na ka, era vinakata me ra tiko kina vata kei keda, ka meda dua ga na tamata, o ya me da cilivi me vaka era sa cilivi.

source_text: shall not their cattle and their substance and every beast of theirs be ours? only let us consent unto them, and they will dwell with us.
target_text: "e na sega beka ni noda na nodra manumanu kei na veika era taukena, na ka e nodra ena noda? me da vaka io ga vei ira, ka era na tiko vata kei keda. "

source_text: and unto hamor and unto shechem his son hearkened all that went out of the gate of his city; and every male was circumcised, all that went out of the gate of his city.
target_text: o ira kece sa lako yani ki na matamata, sa vaka io vei emori kei sikemi na luvena. era sa cilivi kece na tagane mai na koro.

source_text: and it came to pass on the third day, when they were sore, that two of the sons of jacob, simeon and levi, dinah's brethren, took each man his sword, and came upon the city boldly, and slew all the males.
target_text: sa yaco ni sa oti e tolu na siga â€œni se tarai ira tiko na mosi-vuvuca ni veicili, o simione kei livai na luvei jekope, o irau na ganei taina â€œera sa taura na nodrau i seleiwau ka lako vakadoudou ki na koro ka vakamatei ira kecega na tagane.

source_text: and they slew hamor and shechem his son with the edge of the sword, and took dinah out of shechem's house, and went out.
target_text: e rau sa vakamatei emori kei sikemi talega e nai seleiwau ka vakacacana na koro ka kauti taina tani mai na vale nei sikemi ka lako tani.

source_text: the sons of jacob came upon the slain, and spoiled the city, because they had defiled their sister.
target_text: era sa curuma yani na koro, o ira na luvei jekope ka raica na veivakamatei, baleta na veivakacacani sa caka vei taina.

source_text: they took their sheep, and their oxen, and their asses, and that which was in the city, and that which was in the field,
target_text: era sa kauta na sipi, na bulumakau, na nodra asa â€œna veika sa tiko ena koro kei na veika sa tu mai vanua,

source_text: and all their wealth, and all their little ones, and their wives took they captive, and spoiled even all that was in the house.
target_text: kei na nodra i yau kecega, o ira na gone kei tinadra era sa kau vakavesu. era sa vakacacana ka kauta kece na ka sa tiko e vale.

source_text: and jacob said to simeon and levi, ye have troubled me to make me to stink among the inhabitants of the land, among the canaanites and the perizzites: and i being few in number, they shall gather themselves together against me, and slay me; and i shall be destroyed, i and my house.
target_text: sa tukuna o jekope vei simione kei livai, "drau sa vakaleqai au, ena nomudrau vakaboicataki au ena kedra maliwa na lewenivanua oqo, ena kedra maliwa na kai kenani, kei na perisaiti, ni'u sa lewe vica ga, era na vakasoqoni vata mai ka vakamatei au. au na vakarusai kei na noqu vuvale. "

source_text: and they said, should he deal with our sister as with an harlot?
target_text: e rau sa sauma mai na cauravou, "me vakatautauvatataka na tamata oqo na ganei keirau me vaka na yalewa dauvolitaki koya? "

source_text: and god said unto jacob, arise, go up to bethel, and dwell there: and make there an altar unto god, that appeared unto thee when thou fleddest from the face of esau thy brother.
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna vei jekope, "mo tucake ka lako ki peceli ka la'ki tiko kina; mo cakava mai kea e dua nai cabocabo ni soro vei jiova â€œo koya e a basika mai vei iko, ena nomu a dro tiko mai vei iso na tacimu. "

source_text: then jacob said unto his household, and to all that were with him, put away the strange gods that are among you, and be clean, and change your garments:
target_text: o jekope sa tukuna ki na nona vuvale kei ira kece sa tiko vua, "me biu na kalou tani sa tiko vei kemuni, ni vakasavasavataki kemuni, ka veisautaka na nomuni i sulu.

source_text: and let us arise, and go up to bethel; and i will make there an altar unto god, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which i went.
target_text: "ka me da sa tucake ka lako ki peceli; au na cakava mai kea e dua nai cabocabo ni soro vei jiova, o koya sa dau vakacegui au ena gauna ni veilecayaki, ka sa tiko vata kei au ena sala au lakova. "

source_text: and they gave unto jacob all the strange gods which were in their hand, and all their earrings which were in their ears; and jacob hid them under the oak which was by shechem.
target_text: era sa solia vei jekope na veikalou tani, kei na kena sau ni daliga â€œo jekope sa vunitaka ena ruku ni veikau e sikemi.

source_text: and they journeyed: and the terror of god was upon the cities that were round about them, and they did not pursue after the sons of jacob.
target_text: era sa lako yani, ka sa kani ira na rere na veimatanitu vakavolivoliti ira, ka era sa sega kina ni via veivala kei ira na luvei jekope.

source_text: so jacob came to luz, which is in the land of canaan, that is, bethel, he and all the people that were with him.
target_text: sa lako mai o jekope ki lusi (oqori o peceli) ena vanua o kenani, o koya kei ira na tamata sa tiko vata kei koya.

source_text: and he built there an altar, and called the place elbethel: because there god appeared unto him, when he fled from the face of his brother.
target_text: sa tara mai kea e dua na i cabocabo ni soro ka vakatoka me eli-peceli, baleta mai kea sa basika kina vua na kalou ena nona dro mai vei iso na tacina.

source_text: but deborah rebekah's nurse died, and she was buried beneath bethel under an oak: and the name of it was called allonbachuth.
target_text: sa mate o tepora na dauveiqaravi nei rapeka, ka sa buluti mai peceli ena ruku ni vunikau, ena tikina e ra. sa vakayacani na vanua o ya o alonibakuci.

source_text: and god appeared unto jacob again, when he came out of padanaram, and blessed him.
target_text: sa basika tale na kalou vei jekope ena nona lako mai padani-erami ka vakalouvinakataki koya.

source_text: and god said unto him, thy name is jacob: thy name shall not be called any more jacob, but israel shall be thy name: and he called his name israel.
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna vua, "na yacamu o jekope â€œo sa na sega tale ni jekope, o isireli sa na yacamu mai ni kua. " na kalou sa kaciva na yacana me isireli.

source_text: and god said unto him, i am god almighty: be fruitful and multiply; a nation and a company of nations shall be of thee, and kings shall come out of thy loins;
target_text: na kalou sa tukuna vua, "oi au na kalou qaqa, mo vuavuai ka lewe levu mai, na matanitu kei na veimatanitu era na lako mai vei iko, na veitui era na lako mai yagomu.

source_text: and the land which i gave abraham and isaac, to thee i will give it, and to thy seed after thee will i give the land.
target_text: "na vanua au sa solia vei eparaama kei aisake, au sa solia vei iko kei ira na nomu kawa, au sa solia kina na vanua. "

source_text: and god went up from him in the place where he talked with him.
target_text: na kalou sa lako cake mai vua, ena vanua sa vosa kina vua.

source_text: and jacob set up a pillar in the place where he talked with him, even a pillar of stone: and he poured a drink offering thereon, and he poured oil thereon.
target_text: sa vakaduria o jekope e dua na duru ena vanua sa vosa kina vua na kalou, na duru vatu; sa sova kina e dua nai soro liviraki sa sova/lumuta talega kina na waiwai.

source_text: and jacob called the name of the place where god spake with him, bethel.
target_text: sa vakayacana o jekope na vanua sa vosa kina vua na kalou, me o peceli.

source_text: and they journeyed from bethel; and there was but a little way to come to ephrath: and rachel travailed, and she had hard labour.
target_text: era sa lako tani mai peceli, ka se vo vakalailai me yaco ki efiraca, sa taratara o raijeli ka sa kaukauwa sara.

source_text: and it came to pass, when she was in hard labour, that the midwife said unto her, fear not; thou shalt have this son also.
target_text: ni sa kaukauwa sara na nona taratara ni vakasucu, sa tukuna vua na nona nasi, "kua ni rere, ena lako mai na gone tagane oqo. "

source_text: and it came to pass, as her soul was in departing, (for she died) that she called his name benoni: but his father called him benjamin.
target_text: sa yaco, ni sa lako tani tiko vua na yalona (sa mate), sa vakayacani koya me peni-oni, ia, o tamana sa vakayacana me penijamini.

source_text: and rachel died, and was buried in the way to ephrath, which is bethlehem.
target_text: sa mate o raijieli, ka sa bulu ni ra sa lako tiko ki efiraca (oqori o peceliema).

source_text: and jacob set a pillar upon her grave: that is the pillar of rachel's grave unto this day.
target_text: sa vakaduria e dua na duru o jekope ena kena i bulubulu me yacova na siga oqo.

source_text: and israel journeyed, and spread his tent beyond the tower of edar.
target_text: sa lako tiko o isireli, ka biria na nona vale-laca ni sivia na vanua ni yadra e eola.

source_text: and it came to pass, when israel dwelt in that land, that reuben went and lay with bilhah his father's concubine: and israel heard it. now the sons of jacob were twelve:
target_text: sa yaco, ni sa tiko ena vanua o isireli, o rupeni sa moceri bila na (dauveiqaravi) nei raijeli, sa rogoca o isireli na ka oqo. na luvei jekope tagane e tinikarua:

source_text: the sons of leah; reuben, jacob's firstborn, and simeon, and levi, and judah, and issachar, and zebulun:
target_text: na luvei lia tagane o rupeni na ulumatua, o simione, o livai, o juta, o isakari kei sevuloni;

source_text: the sons of rachel; joseph, and benjamin:
target_text: na luvei raijeli tagane o: joseva kei penijamini;

source_text: and the sons of bilhah, rachel's handmaid; dan, and naphtali:
target_text: na luvei bila tagane, (na dauveiqaravi) nei raijeli; o tani kei navitalai;

source_text: and the sons of zilpah, leah's handmaid; gad, and asher: these are the sons of jacob, which were born to him in padanaram.
target_text: na luvei sipa tagane, (na dauveiqaravi) nei lia; o kata kei aseri. oqo, o ira na luvei jekope tagane era sa vakasucumi vua e padani-erami.

source_text: and jacob came unto isaac his father unto mamre, unto the city of arbah, which is hebron, where abraham and isaac sojourned.
target_text: sa lako mai o jekope vei tamana o aisake e mamire kirijaci araba (oqori o epironi), na vanua e rau mai tiko kina o eparaama kei aisake.

source_text: and the days of isaac were an hundred and fourscore years.
target_text: na yabaki nei aisake e dua na drau ka mani walusagavulu na yabaki.

source_text: and isaac gave up the ghost, and died, and was gathered unto his people, being old and full of days: and his sons esau and jacob buried him.
target_text: sa ceguva nai otioti ni nona i cegu o aisake, ka sa mate, sa lako yani vei ira na wekana ni sa qase sara ka sa levu na nona veisiga vinaka. e rau sa buluti koya na nona cauravou, o iso kei jekope.

source_text: now these are the generations of esau, who is edom.
target_text: oqo nai vola ni kawa nei iso, sa vakayacani talega me o itomi.

source_text: esau took his wives of the daughters of canaan; adah the daughter of elon the hittite, and aholibamah the daughter of anah the daughter of zibeon the hivite;
target_text: o iso sa taura na watina mai vei ira na goneyalewa ni kenani: o ada na luvei eloni na itaiti; o aolibama na luvei ana, na luvei sibioni na iraiti;

source_text: and bashemath ishmael's daughter, sister of nebajoth.
target_text: kei vasemaca, na luvei isimeli, na ganei nebajoci.

source_text: and adah bare to esau eliphaz; and bashemath bare reuel;
target_text: o ada sa vakasucumi elifasi vei iso kei vasemaca sa vakasucumi rueli.

source_text: and aholibamah bare jeush, and jaalam, and korah: these are the sons of esau, which were born unto him in the land of canaan.
target_text: o aolibama sa vakasucumi jeusi, jaelami, kei kora. sai ira oqori na luvei iso, sa vakasucumi vua ena vanua o kenani.

source_text: and esau took his wives, and his sons, and his daughters, and all the persons of his house, and his cattle, and all his beasts, and all his substance, which he had got in the land of canaan; and went into the country from the face of his brother jacob.
target_text: o iso sa kauti ira na watina, ira na luvena kei ira kece ena nona vuvale, na nona bulumakau kei na nona manumanu kece kei na nona veika kece sa rawata mai na vanua o kenani. ka sa lako ki na vanua vakayawa sara mai na matai tacina o jekope.

source_text: for their riches were more than that they might dwell together; and the land wherein they were strangers could not bear them because of their cattle.
target_text: sa ka levu sara na nodrau dui-yau, sa na dredre kina me rau na tiko vata, kei na vanua e rau tiko vulagi kina, sa dredre me tokoni rau, baleta na levu ni nodrau manumanu.

source_text: thus dwelt esau in mount seir: esau is edom.
target_text: o iso, sa tiko ena ulunivanua o sia. o iso, sai itomi.

source_text: and these are the generations of esau the father of the edomites in mount seir:
target_text: oqo na kawa nei iso na tamadra na itomi ena ulunivanua o sia.

source_text: these are the names of esau's sons; eliphaz the son of adah the wife of esau, reuel the son of bashemath the wife of esau.
target_text: oqo na yacadra na luvei iso; o elifasi na luvei ada na wati iso kei rueli na luvei vasemaca na wati iso.

source_text: and the sons of eliphaz were teman, omar, zepho, and gatam, and kenaz.
target_text: o ira na luvei elifasi o temana, o omari, o sefo, o qatama kei kenasi.

source_text: and timna was concubine to eliphaz esau's son; and she bare to eliphaz amalek: these were the sons of adah esau's wife.
target_text: o timina na wati elifasi lailai sa vakasucumi amaleki vei elifasi. sai ira oqo na luvei ada na wati iso.

source_text: and these are the sons of reuel; nahath, and zerah, shammah, and mizzah: these were the sons of bashemath esau's wife.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei rueli; o naaci, o sera, o sama kei misa. oqo o ira na luvei vasemaca na wati iso.

source_text: and these were the sons of aholibamah, the daughter of anah the daughter of zibeon, esau's wife: and she bare to esau jeush, and jaalam, and korah.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei aolibama, na wati iso na luvei ana yalewa, na luvei sibione yalewa. sa vakasucuma vei iso, o jeusi, o jaelami kei kora.

source_text: these were dukes of the sons of esau: the sons of eliphaz the firstborn son of esau; duke teman, duke omar, duke zepho, duke kenaz,
target_text: sai ira oqo na vei turaga vei ira na luvei iso. o ira na luvei elifasi na ulumatua nei iso, o temami na turaga, o oma na turaga, o sefo na turaga, o kenasi na turaga,

source_text: duke korah, duke gatam, and duke amalek: these are the dukes that came of eliphaz in the land of edom; these were the sons of adah.
target_text: o kora na turaga, o qatama na turaga, o ameleki na turaga. sai ira oqo na vei turaga nei elifasi ena vanua o itomi. oqo o ira na luvei ada.

source_text: and these are the sons of reuel esau's son; duke nahath, duke zerah, duke shammah, duke mizzah: these are the dukes that came of reuel in the land of edom; these are the sons of bashemath esau's wife.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei rueli na luvei iso. o naaci na turaga, o sera na turaga, o sama na turaga kei misa na turaga. sai ira oqo na veituraga nei rueli ena vanua o itomi. oqo o ira na luvei vasemaca na wati iso.

source_text: and these are the sons of aholibamah esau's wife; duke jeush, duke jaalam, duke korah: these were the dukes that came of aholibamah the daughter of anah, esau's wife.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei aolibama, na wati iso. o jeusi na turaga, o jaelami na turaga kei kora na turaga. sai ira oqo na vei turaga era sa lako mai vei aolibama na wati iso, na luvei ana.

source_text: these are the sons of esau, who is edom, and these are their dukes.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei iso, (itomi); oqori o ira na kena vei turaga.

source_text: these are the sons of seir the horite, who inhabited the land; lotan, and shobal, and zibeon, and anah,
target_text: o ira oqo na luvei sia na oraite, o ira sa tawana tiko na vanua: o lotani, o sobali, o sibione, kei ana,

source_text: and dishon, and ezer, and dishan: these are the dukes of the horites, the children of seir in the land of edom.
target_text: o disioni, o esari, kei disani. sai ira oqori na turaga nodra na oraite, o ira na luvei sia ena vanua o itomi.

source_text: and the children of lotan were hori and hemam; and lotan's sister was timna.
target_text: o ira na luvei lotani, o ori kei emami, na ganei lotani o timina.

source_text: and the children of shobal were these; alvan, and manahath, and ebal, shepho, and onam.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei sobali: o elirani, o manaeci, o ibali, o sefo, kei onami.

source_text: and these are the children of zibeon; both ajah, and anah: this was that anah that found the mules in the wilderness, as he fed the asses of zibeon his father.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei sibione, o rau o aja kei anae. o anae oqo sa kunea na wai ena vanua liwa, ni a lako voli kina ka vakania tiko na asa nei tamana o sibione.

source_text: and the children of anah were these; dishon, and aholibamah the daughter of anah.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei anae: o disioni kei aolibama na luvei anae yalewa.

source_text: and these are the children of dishon; hemdan, and eshban, and ithran, and cheran.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei disioni; o amedani, o esibana, o icarani, kei jerani.

source_text: the children of ezer are these; bilhan, and zaavan, and akan.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei esari, biliani, o saerani, kei akani.

source_text: the children of dishan are these; uz, and aran.
target_text: sai ira oqo na luvei disani, o usi kei erani.

source_text: these are the dukes that came of the horites; duke lotan, duke shobal, duke zibeon, duke anah,
target_text: sai ira oqo na veituraga e oraite: o lotani na turaga, o sobali na turaga, o sibione na turaga, o anae na turaga,

source_text: duke dishon, duke ezer, duke dishan: these are the dukes that came of hori, among their dukes in the land of seir.
target_text: o disioni na turaga, o esari na turaga, o disani na turaga, o ira oqo na veituraga vei ira na oraite, me vaka na nodra dui turaga ena vanua o sia.

source_text: and these are the kings that reigned in the land of edom, before there reigned any king over the children of israel.
target_text: sai ira oqo na veitui sa lewa e itomi, ni se bera na tui vei ira na isireli:

source_text: and bela the son of beor reigned in edom: and the name of his city was dinhabah.
target_text: o bela na luvei peori, sa lewa e itomi, na yaca ni nona koro o diniaba.

source_text: and bela died, and jobab the son of zerah of bozrah reigned in his stead.
target_text: ni sa mate o bela, o jobaba na luvei sera e bosara sa veiliutaki ena vukuna.

source_text: and jobab died, and husham of the land of temani reigned in his stead.
target_text: ni sa mate o jobaba, o usaemi ena vanua noda na temanaiti sa lewa ena vukui jobaba.

source_text: and husham died, and hadad the son of bedad, who smote midian in the field of moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was avith.
target_text: ni sa mate o usaemi, o etati na luvei betati, o koya sa kabai mitiani ena buca mai moape, sa lewa ena vukuna. na yaca ni koro o avici.

source_text: and hadad died, and samlah of masrekah reigned in his stead.
target_text: ni sa mate o etati, o samila mai masareka sa lewa ena vukui etati.

source_text: and samlah died, and saul of rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
target_text: ni sa mate o samila, o saula mai reopoci ena bati ni uciwai, sa lewa ena vukuna.

source_text: and saul died, and baalhanan the son of achbor reigned in his stead.
target_text: ni sa mate o saula, o peali-anana na luvei akebori sa lewa ena vukuna.

source_text: and baalhanan the son of achbor died, and hadar reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was pau; and his wife's name was mehetabel, the daughter of matred, the daughter of mezahab.
target_text: ni sa mate o peali-anana na luvei akebori o adari sa lewa ena vukuna; na yaca ni nona koro o pau. na yaca i watina o maetabeli na luvei matereti, na luvei maseabi yalewa.

source_text: and these are the names of the dukes that came of esau, according to their families, after their places, by their names; duke timnah, duke alvah, duke jetheth,
target_text: sai ira oqo na veituraga nei iso, me vaka na nodra veivuvale ena nodra i tikotiko, na yacadra yadudua oqo: o timana na turaga, o alava na turaga, o jeteci na turaga,

source_text: duke aholibamah, duke elah, duke pinon,
target_text: o aolibama na turaga, o ela na turaga, o pinoni na turaga,

source_text: duke kenaz, duke teman, duke mibzar,
target_text: o kenasi na turaga, o temana na turaga o mibisa na turaga,

source_text: duke magdiel, duke iram: these be the dukes of edom, according to their habitations in the land of their possession: he is esau the father of the edomites.
target_text: o meqedeeli na turaga kei irami na turaga. sai ira oqo na veituraga e itomi me vaka na nodra dui tikotiko ena vanua era sa taukena. o iso sa tamadra na kai itomi.

source_text: and jacob dwelt in the land wherein his father was a stranger, in the land of canaan.
target_text: o jekope sa tiko ena vanua sa vulagi kina o tamana, ena vanua o kenani.

source_text: these are the generations of jacob. joseph, being seventeen years old, was feeding the flock with his brethren; and the lad was with the sons of bilhah, and with the sons of zilpah, his father's wives: and joseph brought unto his father their evil report.
target_text: oqo na kawa i jekope. o joseva ni se qai yabaki tinikavitu, sa vaka na manumanu tiko vata kei ira na tacina. o koya sa tiko kei ira na luvei bila kei ira na luvei siliva na wati tamana. o joseva sa kauta na kedratou i tukutuku ca vei tamana.

source_text: now israel loved joseph more than all his children, because he was the son of his old age: and he made him a coat of many colours.
target_text: o isireli, sa lomani joseva vakalevu cake mai vei ira kece na luvena, baleta ni o koya e luvena ni sa qase sara. sa dau cula talega na nona kote balavu ka dui rokaroka.

source_text: and when his brethren saw that their father loved him more than all his brethren, they hated him, and could not speak peaceably unto him.
target_text: ni ratou sa dau raica na tacina ni sa daulomani koya vakalevu o isireli mai vei iratou, e ratou sa dau cati koya ka dauvosa vakaca vua.

source_text: and joseph dreamed a dream, and he told it his brethren: and they hated him yet the more.
target_text: o joseva sa tadra e dua na tadra, ka tukuna sara vei ira na tacina; e ratou sa qai cati koya ga vakalevu.

source_text: and he said unto them, hear, i pray you, this dream which i have dreamed:
target_text: sa tukuna vei iratou na tacina, "au kerea mo dou rogoca na noqu tadra:

source_text: for, behold, we were binding sheaves in the field, and, lo, my sheaf arose, and also stood upright; and, behold, your sheaves stood round about, and made obeisance to my sheaf.
target_text: "edatou sa vau sila tiko ena were, sa duri ka tucake tu na noqui vau sila; na nomudou i vau sila talega sa tucake ka cuva kina noqu i vau sila. "

source_text: and his brethren said to him, shalt thou indeed reign over us? or shalt thou indeed have dominion over us? and they hated him yet the more for his dreams, and for his words.
target_text: e ratou sa tukuna vua na tacina, "o iko, mo na mai liutaki keitou? se o mai via vakatulewa vei keitou? " e ratou sa qai cati koya ga vakalevu baleta na nona tadra kei na nona vosa.

source_text: and he dreamed yet another dream, and told it his brethren, and said, behold, i have dreamed a dream more; and, behold, the sun and the moon and the eleven stars made obeisance to me.
target_text: e se baci tadra tale e dua na tadra, ka tukuna vei ira na tacina ka vaka: "au sa baci tadra tale, ka sa vaka oqo, na siga, na vula kei na veikalokalo era sa cuva kece vei au. "

source_text: and he told it to his father, and to his brethren: and his father rebuked him, and said unto him, what is this dream that thou hast dreamed? shall i and thy mother and thy brethren indeed come to bow down ourselves to thee to the earth?
target_text: sa tukuna vei tamana kei ira na tacina, sa vunauci koya o tamana ka tukuna vua, "e tadra vakacava oqo? me lako beka mai o tinamu, o tamamu kei ira na tacimu ka mai cuva ki na qele e matamu? "

source_text: and his brethren envied him; but his father observed the saying.
target_text: era sa qai vuvutaki koya ga na tacina, ia, o tamana sa taura vuni tikoga ki yalona.

source_text: and his brethren went to feed their father's flock in shechem.
target_text: era sa lako ki sikemi na tacina me ra vakania na sipi nei tamadra.

source_text: and israel said unto joseph, do not thy brethren feed the flock in shechem? come, and i will send thee unto them. and he said to him, here am i.
target_text: sa tukuna o isireli vei joseva, "era sa sega beka ni tiko mai sikemi na tacimu? lako mai me'u talai iko vei ira. sa sauma mai o joseva, "sai au oqo. "

source_text: and he said to him, go, i pray thee, see whether it be well with thy brethren, and well with the flocks; and bring me word again. so he sent him out of the vale of hebron, and he came to shechem.
target_text: sa tukuna sara vua, "lako ka raica se sa vakatiko e vei o ira na tacimu kei ira na manumanu, ka kauta lesu mai vei au na i tukutuku. " sa vakatalai koya tani yani mai na buca o epironi ka sa lako sara yani ki sikemi.

source_text: and a certain man found him, and, behold, he was wandering in the field: and the man asked him, saying, what seekest thou?
target_text: e dua na tamata sa kunei koya, ni sa veilakoyaki voli ena vanua. sa tarogi koya na tamata, "na cava o sa vakasaqara tiko? "

source_text: and he said, i seek my brethren: tell me, i pray thee, where they feed their flocks.
target_text: sa sauma yani, "au vakaraici iratou tiko na tuakaqu, era sa vakana manumanu tiko e vei. "

source_text: and the man said, they are departed hence; for i heard them say, let us go to dothan. and joseph went after his brethren, and found them in dothan.
target_text: sa tukuna mai na tamata, "era sa lako tani eke, ia, au sa rogoci ira ga ni ra sa tukuna, 'tou lako ki tocani. '" a sa lako yani o joseva ka kunei iratou na tuakana e tocani.

source_text: and when they saw him afar off, even before he came near unto them, they conspired against him to slay him.
target_text: ni ra sa raici koya tiko mai vakayawa, era sa bosea me vakamatei koya.

source_text: and they said one to another, behold, this dreamer cometh.
target_text: era sa veitukuniyaka, "raica sa lako tiko mai oqo na dautadra!

source_text: come now therefore, and let us slay him, and cast him into some pit, and we will say, some evil beast hath devoured him: and we shall see what will become of his dreams.
target_text: "mai, me da sa na vakamatei koya ka viritaki koya ki na dua na qara, me noda i ulubale, 'me dua na manumanu kila sa vakamatei koya, ' eda na qai raica se sa vakacava na nona tadra! "

source_text: and reuben heard it, and he delivered him out of their hands; and said, let us not kill him.
target_text: ia, ni sa rogoca o rupeni, sa vakabulai koya mai na ligadra ka tukuna, "me da kua ni vakamatei koya. "

source_text: and reuben said unto them, shed no blood, but cast him into this pit that is in the wilderness, and lay no hand upon him; that he might rid him out of their hands, to deliver him to his father again.
target_text: sa tukuna vei ira o rupeni, "me kua ni vakadavei na dra, me viritaki ga ki na qara sa tiko mai na vanua liwa, me kua ga ni da tarai koya ena ligada" â€œni sa nakita me vakabulai joseva mai vei ira na tacina ka kauti koya lesu vei tamadra.

source_text: and it came to pass, when joseph was come unto his brethren, that they stript joseph out of his coat, his coat of many colours that was on him;
target_text: ni sa qai yaco mai vei ira o joseva, era sa basuraka na nona kote, na kote dui rokaroka sa dara tiko.

source_text: and they took him, and cast him into a pit: and the pit was empty, there was no water in it.
target_text: era sa tauri koya ka viritaki koya ki na qara. sa lala tu na qara, ni sa maca tu na kena wai.

source_text: and they sat down to eat bread: and they lifted up their eyes and looked, and, behold, a company of ishmeelites came from gilead with their camels bearing spicery and balm and myrrh, going to carry it down to egypt.
target_text: era sa dabe sobu ka kana. ni ra sa rai yani, era sa lako tiko mai e dua nai lawalawa era luvei isimeli, era lako tiko mai kiliati kei na nodra kameli, kei na nodra i usausa ni voliciri ena nodra lako sobu tiko ki ijipita.

source_text: and judah said unto his brethren, what profit is it if we slay our brother, and conceal his blood?
target_text: sa tukuna o juta vei ira na tacina, "na cava na kena yaga, kevaka e da na vakamatei koya ka vunitaka na nona dra?

source_text: come, and let us sell him to the ishmeelites, and let not our hand be upon him; for he is our brother and our flesh. and his brethren were content.
target_text: "me da volitaki koya vei ira na isimeli, me kua ni tarai koya kina na ligada, ni o koya e tacida ka eda lewe vata. " era sa rogoca na tacina na veika oqo.

source_text: then there passed by midianites merchantmen; and they drew and lifted up joseph out of the pit, and sold joseph to the ishmeelites for twenty pieces of silver: and they brought joseph into egypt.
target_text: era sa lako tale mai na kai mitiani dauveivoli, era sa tauri joseva mai ka volitaki koya yani vei ira na isimeli me ruasagavulu na sikele siliva. era sa kauti joseva ki ijipita.

source_text: and reuben returned unto the pit; and, behold, joseph was not in the pit; and he rent his clothes.
target_text: sa lesu yani o rupeni ki na qara, ka sa yali kina o joseva, sa basuraka na nona i sulu.

source_text: and he returned unto his brethren, and said, the child is not; and i, whither shall i go?
target_text: sa lesu yani vei iratou na tacina ka tukuna, "sa yali na gone, me'u lako beka i vei? "
