source_text: and they told him all the words of joseph, which he had said unto them: and when he saw the wagons which joseph had sent to carry him, the spirit of jacob their father revived:
target_text: ia, ni ra sa tukuna vua na vosa kece i joseva, ka sa raica talega na qiqi vakavale sa soli mai me mai vodo kina, sa vakabulabulataki tale na yaloi jekope na tamadra.

source_text: and israel said, it is enough; joseph my son is yet alive: i will go and see him before i die.
target_text: sa qai tukuna o isireli, "sa rauta, e se bula tiko o joseva na luvequ. au na lako ka raici koya ni bera ni'u mate. "

source_text: and israel took his journey with all that he had, and came to beersheba, and offered sacrifices unto the god of his father isaac.
target_text: sa kauta o isireli na nona veika kece ena nona i lakolako ka sa lako mai ki perisepa ka vakacabora nai soro vua na kalou i aisake na tamana.

source_text: and god spake unto israel in the visions of the night, and said, jacob, jacob. and he said, here am i.
target_text: na kalou sa qai vosa vei isireli ena raivotu ena bogi ka tukuna: "jekope, jekope, " sa sauma mai o jekope, "sai au oqo. "

source_text: and he said, i am god, the god of thy father: fear not to go down into egypt; for i will there make of thee a great nation:
target_text: sa tukuna mai, "oi au na kalou, na kalou i tamamu, kua ni rere ni lako sobu i ijipita, au na vakayacora mo matanitu levu mai kea.

source_text: i will go down with thee into egypt; and i will also surely bring thee up again: and joseph shall put his hand upon thine eyes.
target_text: "au na lako sobu vata kei iko ki ijipita, au na kauti iko lesu tale mai vakaidina. o joseva ena biuta na ligana e mataqu. "

source_text: and jacob rose up from beersheba: and the sons of israel carried jacob their father, and their little ones, and their wives, in the wagons which pharaoh had sent to carry him.
target_text: sa tucake o jekope mai perisepa, o ira na luvei isireli era sa kauti jekope, ira na nodra lalai, kei ira na watidra ena qiqi vakavale ea solia mai o fero me ra mai vodo kina.

source_text: and they took their cattle, and their goods, which they had gotten in the land of canaan, and came into egypt, jacob, and all his seed with him:
target_text: era sa kauta na nodra manumanu kei na nodra i yaya, era sa rawata ena vanua o kenani, ka lako sobu ki ijipita, o jekope kei ira kecega na nona kawa.

source_text: his sons, and his sons' sons with him, his daughters, and his sons' daughters, and all his seed brought he with him into egypt.
target_text: o ira na luvena tagane kei na luvedra tagane na luvena, na luvedra yalewa kei na luvedra yalewa na luvena tagane, kei ira kece na nona kawa, sa kauti ira kece ki ijipita.

source_text: and these are the names of the children of israel, which came into egypt, jacob and his sons: reuben, jacob's firstborn.
target_text: sai ira oqo na yacadra na luvei isireli, jekope kei na luvena tagane, o ira sa lako sobu ki ijipita. o rupeni na ulumatua nei jekope.

source_text: and the sons of reuben; hanoch, and phallu, and hezron, and carmi.
target_text: o ira na luvei rupeni tagane, o anoki, o palu, o esironi kei kami.

source_text: and the sons of simeon; jemuel, and jamin, and ohad, and jachin, and zohar, and shaul the son of a canaanitish woman.
target_text: o ira na luvei simione tagane: o jemueli, o jamini, o qada, o jakini, o soara, o saula na luveni dua na yalewa ni kenani.

source_text: and the sons of levi; gershon, kohath, and merari.
target_text: o ira na luvei livai tagane: o kerisoni, o koata, kei merari.

source_text: and the sons of judah; er, and onan, and shelah, and pharez, and zerah: but er and onan died in the land of canaan. and the sons of pharez were hezron and hamul.
target_text: o ira na luvei juta tagane: o eri, o onani, o sela, o veresi, kei sera. (o eri kei onani e rau sa mate ena vanua o kenani). na luvei veresi o esironi kei amulu.

source_text: and the sons of issachar; tola, and phuvah, and job, and shimron.
target_text: o ira na luvei isakari tagane: o tola, o pura, o jope, o simironi.

source_text: and the sons of zebulun; sered, and elon, and jahleel.
target_text: o ira na luvei sevuloni tagane: o sareti, o eloni, kei jaelieli.

source_text: these be the sons of leah, which she bare unto jacob in padanaram, with his daughter dinah: all the souls of his sons and his daughters were thirty and three.
target_text: sai ira oqori na luvei lia tagane, sa vakasucuma vei jekope mai padani-erami kei taina na luvena yalewa. o ira kece oqo sa lewe tolusagavulu ka tolu na tamata.

source_text: and the sons of gad; ziphion, and haggi, shuni, and ezbon, eri, and arodi, and areli.
target_text: o ira na luvei kata tagane: o sifioni, o aqi, o suni, o esiboni, o eri, o arodi, kei areli.

source_text: and the sons of asher; jimnah, and ishuah, and isui, and beriah, and serah their sister: and the sons of beriah; heber, and malchiel.
target_text: o ira na luvei aseri tagane: o jimina, o isua, o beria kei sera na luvena yalewa. o ira na luvei beria tagane, o eba kei malikieli.

source_text: these are the sons of zilpah, whom laban gave to leah his daughter, and these she bare unto jacob, even sixteen souls.
target_text: sai ira oqori na luvei siliva na dauveiqaravi nei lia. o ira kece oqo sa tinikaono na tamata.

source_text: the sons of rachel jacob's wife; joseph, and benjamin.
target_text: na luvei raijeli tagane na wati jekope: o joseva kei penijamini.

source_text: and unto joseph in the land of egypt were born manasseh and ephraim, which asenath the daughter of potipherah priest of on bare unto him.
target_text: vei joseva ena vanua o ijipita sa sucu kina o manasa kei ifereimi, e rau sa vakasucumi mai vei vasemaca na luvei poti-fera na bete.

source_text: and the sons of benjamin were belah, and becher, and ashbel, gera, and naaman, ehi, and rosh, muppim, and huppim, and ard.
target_text: o ira na luvei penijamini tagane: o bela, o bikeri, o asiveli, o qera, o nemani, o ei, o rosi, o mupimi, o upimi kei areti.

source_text: these are the sons of rachel, which were born to jacob: all the souls were fourteen.
target_text: o ira oqori na luvei raijeli tagane, sa vakasucuma vei jekope e tinikava na tamata.

source_text: and the sons of dan; hushim.
target_text: na luvei tani: o usimi.

source_text: and the sons of naphtali; jahzeel, and guni, and jezer, and shillem.
target_text: o ira na luvei navitalai: o jasili, o qani, o jasa kei silemi.

source_text: these are the sons of bilhah, which laban gave unto rachel his daughter, and she bare these unto jacob: all the souls were seven.
target_text: o ira oqori na luvei bila na dauveiqaravi nei raijeli. sa vakasucuma vei jekope e vitu na tamata.

source_text: all the souls that came with jacob into egypt, which came out of his loins, besides jacob's sons' wives, all the souls were threescore and six;
target_text: o ira kece na tamata era sa lako vata kei jekope ki ijipita â€œo ira kece sa lako mai ena yagona, sa onosagavulu ka ono na tamata.

source_text: and the sons of joseph, which were born him in egypt, were two souls: all the souls of the house of jacob, which came into egypt, were threescore and ten.
target_text: oi rau na luvei joseva sa sucu mai na vanua o ijipita, sa lewe rua. o ira kece na vuvale i jekope sa lako sobu ki ijipita sa vitusagavulu na tamata.

source_text: and he sent judah before him unto joseph, to direct his face unto goshen; and they came into the land of goshen.
target_text: sa vakatalai juta yani e liu o jekope vei joseva, me dusimaka vei ira na sala ki koseni. era sa lako mai ki na vanua o koseni.

source_text: and joseph made ready his chariot, and went up to meet israel his father, to goshen, and presented himself unto him; and he fell on his neck, and wept on his neck a good while.
target_text: sa vakarautaka o joseva na nona qiqi vakavale ka lako cake ki koseni me sota kei isireli na tamana; sa mokoti tamana yani ka rau sa veitagicaki.

source_text: and israel said unto joseph, now let me die, since i have seen thy face, because thou art yet alive.
target_text: o isireli sa tukuna vei joseva, "mo laivi au me'u mate, ni'u sa raica tale na matamu, baleta ni o se bula tiko. "

source_text: and joseph said unto his brethren, and unto his father's house, i will go up, and shew pharaoh, and say unto him, my brethren, and my father's house, which were in the land of canaan, are come unto me;
target_text: o joseva sa tukuna vei ira na tacina kei ira kece na vuvale nei tamana, "au na lako cake vei fero ka tukuna vua, 'ni o ira kece na taciqu kei na vuvale kece nei tamaqu era sa tiko mai na vanua o kenani, era sa lako mai oqo ki vei au.

source_text: and the men are shepherds, for their trade hath been to feed cattle; and they have brought their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have.
target_text: 'era sa dau vakatawana na sipi, me vaka ga ni nodra cakacaka na vakania na sipi; era sa kauta talega mai na nodra manumanu kece. '

source_text: and it shall come to pass, when pharaoh shall call you, and shall say, what is your occupation?
target_text: "ni sa lako mai o fero me tarogi kemuni, 'se cava na nomuni cakacaka? '

source_text: that ye shall say, thy servants' trade hath been about cattle from our youth even until now, both we, and also our fathers: that ye may dwell in the land of goshen; for every shepherd is an abomination unto the egyptians.
target_text: "mo ni qai tukuna, 'na nodra cakacaka na nomuni tamata sa tu vata ga kei ira na manumanu, mai na neimami gone ka yacova na siga oqo, oi keimami kei ira talega na tamai keimami: ' mo ni tiko kina ena vanua o koseni â€œo ira kece na vakatawa ni manumanu era sa ka vakasisila vei ira na kai ijipita. "

source_text: then joseph came and told pharaoh, and said, my father and my brethren, and their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have, are come out of the land of canaan; and, behold, they are in the land of goshen.
target_text: sa lako o joseva ka tukuna vei fero, "o tamaqu kei ira na taciqu, na nodra manumanu kei na veika kece era taukena â€œera sa lako mai na vanua o kenani, ka era sa tiko ena vanua o koseni. "

source_text: and he took some of his brethren, even five men, and presented them unto pharaoh.
target_text: sa kauta mai e lima, mai vei ira na tacina ka vakaraitaki ira vei fero.

source_text: and pharaoh said unto his brethren, what is your occupation? and they said unto pharaoh, thy servants are shepherds, both we, and also our fathers.
target_text: sa tarogi iratou na tacina o fero, "na cava na nomudou cakacaka? " e ratou sauma vei fero, "o ira na nomuni tamata sa dau vakatawa sipi, o keimami kei ira talega na neimami qase. "

source_text: they said moreover unto pharaoh, for to sojourn in the land are we come; for thy servants have no pasture for their flocks; for the famine is sore in the land of canaan: now therefore, we pray thee, let thy servants dwell in the land of goshen.
target_text: era sa tukuna talega vei fero, "keimami sa lako curuma mai na vanua, ni sa sega na kakana me kedra na manumanu baleta ni sa rui levu na dausiga e kenani. me ra tiko mada na nomuni tamata ena vanua o koseni. "

source_text: and pharaoh spake unto joseph, saying, thy father and thy brethren are come unto thee:
target_text: sa vosa o fero vei joseva ka vaka: "eera sa lako mai na tamamu kei na tacimu vei iko.

source_text: the land of egypt is before thee; in the best of the land make thy father and brethren to dwell; in the land of goshen let them dwell: and if thou knowest any men of activity among them, then make them rulers over my cattle.
target_text: "sa tu e matamu na vanua o ijipita. me ra tiko na tamamu kei na tacimu ena vanua vinaka duadua e ijipita, me ra tiko e koseni. kevaka, talega o sa raica e dua na tamata vinaka vei ira, me mai qarava na noqu manumanu. "

source_text: and joseph brought in jacob his father, and set him before pharaoh: and jacob blessed pharaoh.
target_text: o joseva sa kauti jekope mai na tamana vei fero, ka me tu ena matai fero. sa vakalouvinakataki fero o jekope.

source_text: and pharaoh said unto jacob, how old art thou?
target_text: sa tarogi jekope o fero ka vaka: "o sa yabaki vica? "

source_text: and jacob said unto pharaoh, the days of the years of my pilgrimage are an hundred and thirty years: few and evil have the days of the years of my life been, and have not attained unto the days of the years of the life of my fathers in the days of their pilgrimage.
target_text: sa sauma o jekope, "na veisiga ni noqu bula sa dua na drau ka mani tolusagavulu na yabaki, sa lailai ka ca na veisiga ni noqu bula, sa sega ni vaka na nodra veisiga ni bula na noqu qase. "

source_text: and jacob blessed pharaoh, and went out from before pharaoh.
target_text: sa vakalouvinakataki fero o jekope ka lako tani mai matana.

source_text: and joseph placed his father and his brethren, and gave them a possession in the land of egypt, in the best of the land, in the land of rameses, as pharaoh had commanded.
target_text: o joseva sa vakatikori ira na tamana kei na tacina ena vanua o ijipita, na tikina vinaka duadua ena vanua e ramisese, me vaka sa vakarota o fero.

source_text: and joseph nourished his father, and his brethren, and all his father's household, with bread, according to their families.
target_text: o joseva sa vakani tamana kei ira na tacina, kei na nodra veivuvale me vaka na kedra i wiliwili.

source_text: and there was no bread in all the land; for the famine was very sore, so that the land of egypt and all the land of canaan fainted by reason of the famine.
target_text: sa sega na madrai ena vanua taucoko, ni sa rui dede sara na dausiga, na vanua o ijipita kei kenani sa sega sara ga kina na ka baleta na balavu ni dausiga.

source_text: and joseph gathered up all the money that was found in the land of egypt, and in the land of canaan, for the corn which they bought: and joseph brought the money into pharaoh's house.
target_text: o joseva sa kumuna kece nai lavo ena vanua o ijipita kei na vanua o kenani, ena vuku ni sila era sa mai volia. sa kauta kece mai na i lavo ki na lololo nei fero.

source_text: and when money failed in the land of egypt, and in the land of canaan, all the egyptians came unto joseph, and said, give us bread: for why should we die in thy presence? for the money faileth.
target_text: ni sa oti kece nai lavo e ijipita kei kenani, era sa lako kece mai na ijipita vei joseva ka tukuna, "solia mai na kakana, me keimami mate beka e matamuni? ni sa oti nai lavo. "

source_text: and joseph said, give your cattle; and i will give you for your cattle, if money fail.
target_text: sa sauma yani o joseva, "ni solia mai na manumanu mei voli ni madrai, kevaka sa sega nai lavo. "

source_text: and they brought their cattle unto joseph: and joseph gave them bread in exchange for horses, and for the flocks, and for the cattle of the herds, and for the asses: and he fed them with bread for all their cattle for that year.
target_text: era sa kauta mai na nodra manumanu vei joseva, o joseva sa solia vei ira na madrai mei sosomi ni manumanu era sa kauta mai ena yabaki o ya.

source_text: when that year was ended, they came unto him the second year, and said unto him, we will not hide it from my lord, how that our money is spent; my lord also hath our herds of cattle; there is not ought left in the sight of my lord, but our bodies, and our lands:
target_text: ni sa oti na yabaki o ya, era sa lako tale mai ena yabaki ka tarava, ka tukuna vua, "keimami na sega ni vunitaka ni sa sega vei keimami nai lavo, na neimami turaga talega sa taura na neimami manumanu. sa sega tale na ka e vo â€œna yagoi keimami ga kei na neimami vanua.

source_text: wherefore shall we die before thine eyes, both we and our land? buy us and our land for bread, and we and our land will be servants unto pharaoh: and give us seed, that we may live, and not die, that the land be not desolate.
target_text: "na cava me keimami mate kina ena matamuni, oi keimami kei na neimami qele? mo ni voli keimami kei na neimami vanua ena madrai. oi keimami kei na neimami vanua keimami na bobula vei fero; solia vei keimami nai tei. me keimami bula ka sega ni mate, me kua ni lala na vanua. "

source_text: and joseph bought all the land of egypt for pharaoh; for the egyptians sold every man his field, because the famine prevailed over them: so the land became pharaoh's.
target_text: o joseva sa volia na vanua taucoko o ijipita vei fero, ni tamata kecega e ijipita sa volitaka na nona vanua, baleta ni sa rui sivia sara ga na dausiga. sa yaco me nei fero kece na vanua.

source_text: and as for the people, he removed them to cities from one end of the borders of egypt even to the other end thereof.
target_text: vei ira na tamata, o joseva sa tosoi ira na tamata ki na koro lelevu, mai na dua na yasana ki na dua tale na yasai ijipita.

source_text: only the land of the priests bought he not; for the priests had a portion assigned them of pharaoh, and did eat their portion which pharaoh gave them: wherefore they sold not their lands.
target_text: na nodra vanua ga na bete sa sega ni voli, ni o ira na bete, sa tu ga na kedra i votavota sa vakarautaka tu o fero. oqo, era sa sega ni volitaka kina na nodra vanua.

source_text: then joseph said unto the people, behold, i have bought you this day and your land for pharaoh: lo, here is seed for you, and ye shall sow the land.
target_text: sa qai tukuna o joseva vei ira na tamata, "raica au sa voli kemuni kei na vanua vei fero. oqo nai tei, mo ni tea na vanua.

source_text: and it shall come to pass in the increase, that ye shall give the fifth part unto pharaoh, and four parts shall be your own, for seed of the field, and for your food, and for them of your households, and for food for your little ones.

source_text: and they said, thou hast saved our lives: let us find grace in the sight of my lord, and we will be pharaoh's servants.

source_text: and joseph made it a law over the land of egypt unto this day, that pharaoh should have the fifth part; except the land of the priests only, which became not pharaoh's.

source_text: and israel dwelt in the land of egypt, in the country of goshen; and they had possessions therein, and grew, and multiplied exceedingly.

source_text: and jacob lived in the land of egypt seventeen years: so the whole age of jacob was an hundred forty and seven years.

source_text: and the time drew nigh that israel must die: and he called his son joseph, and said unto him, if now i have found grace in thy sight, put, i pray thee, thy hand under my thigh, and deal kindly and truly with me; bury me not, i pray thee, in egypt:

source_text: but i will lie with my fathers, and thou shalt carry me out of egypt, and bury me in their buryingplace. and he said, i will do as thou hast said.

source_text: and he said, swear unto me. and he sware unto him. and israel bowed himself upon the bed's head.

source_text: my father made me swear, saying, lo, i die: in my grave which i have digged for me in the land of canaan, there shalt thou bury me. now therefore let me go up, i pray thee, and bury my father, and i will come again.
target_text: 'o tamaqu sa vakavuna na noqu bubului vua, ka tukuna: "raica, au na mate ena noqu i bulubulu au sa kelia oti ena vanua o kenani, mo buluti au ga mai kea. "oqo, au sa kerea me'u lako cake ka buluti tamaqu, au na lesu tale mai. '"

target_text: era sa vakayacora na luvena, me vaka ga sa vakarota vei ira o isireli na tamadra.

source_text: for his sons carried him into the land of canaan, and buried him in the cave of the field of machpelah, which abraham bought with the field for a possession of a buryingplace of ephron the hittite, before mamre.
target_text: ni o ira na luvena era sa kauti koya ki kenani ka buluti koya ena qaravatu mai makapila, e mamire, na vanua e a volia o eparaama mai vei efironi na itaiti, me nona i bulubulu.

source_text: and joseph returned into egypt, he, and his brethren, and all that went up with him to bury his father, after he had buried his father.
target_text: ni sa buluti tamana oti, sa lesu tale ki ijipita o joseva, o koya kei iratou na tacina, kei ira kecega sa lako vata mai kei koya.

source_text: and when joseph's brethren saw that their father was dead, they said, joseph will peradventure hate us, and will certainly requite us all the evil which we did unto him.
target_text: ni ratou sa raica na taci joseva ni sa mate o tamadratou, e ratou sa veitalanoa ka vaka: "oqo ena cati kedatou o joseva, baleta na veika ca e datou a cakava vua. "

source_text: and they sent a messenger unto joseph, saying, thy father did command before he died, saying,
target_text: e ratou sa vakauta e dua nai tukutuku vei joseva ka vaka: "ni se bera ni mate na tamamu sa vakarota ka tukuna,

source_text: so shall ye say unto joseph, forgive, i pray thee now, the trespass of thy brethren, and their sin; for they did unto thee evil: and now, we pray thee, forgive the trespass of the servants of the god of thy father. and joseph wept when they spake unto him.
target_text: 'mo dou tukuna vei joseva, "mo vosota na nodratou caka cala na tacimu kei na nodratou i valavala ca, ni ratou sa caka cala vei iko. "' mo vosota na nodratou caka cala na tamata ni kalou nei tamamu. " sa tagi o joseva, ni ratou sa tukuna vua na veika oqo.

source_text: and his brethren also went and fell down before his face; and they said, behold, we be thy servants.
target_text: e ratou sa tagi talega na tacina ka cuva e matai joseva ka tukuna, "keitou sa nomuni tamata. "

source_text: and joseph said unto them, fear not: for am i in the place of god?
target_text: sa tukuna vei iratou o joseva, "dou kua ni rere, au kalou beka o au?

source_text: but as for you, ye thought evil against me; but god meant it unto good, to bring to pass, as it is this day, to save much people alive.
target_text: "vei kemudou, dou sa caka ca vei au, ia, na kalou sa nakita na ka vinaka vei kemudou, me yaco kina na bula ena siga oqo, me ra vakabulai kina e levu na tamata.

source_text: now therefore fear ye not: i will nourish you, and your little ones. and he comforted them, and spake kindly unto them.
target_text: "o koya oqo, mo dou kua ni rere kina, ni'u sa tu me'u vakarautaka vei kemudou kei ira na lalai. " sa vakaitaukeitaki iratou; ena nona sa vosa vinaka tikoga vei iratou.

source_text: and joseph dwelt in egypt, he, and his father's house: and joseph lived an hundred and ten years.
target_text: sa tiko ga e ijipita o joseva kei ira na vuvale nei tamana. sa bula tiko o joseva me dua na drau ka tini na yabaki.

source_text: and joseph saw ephraim's children of the third generation: the children also of machir the son of manasseh were brought up upon joseph's knees.
target_text: o joseva sa raica nai katolu ni tabatamata nei ifereimi. o ira talega na luvei makiri na luvei manasa era sa dau kau mai vei joseva.

source_text: and joseph said unto his brethren, i die: and god will surely visit you, and bring you out of this land unto the land which he sware to abraham, to isaac, and to jacob.
target_text: sa tukuna o joseva vei iratou na tacina, "raica au sa na mate, na kalou ena sikovi kemudou mai, ka na kauti kemudou ki na vanua sa bubului kina vei eparaama, vei aisake, kei jekope talega. "

source_text: and joseph took an oath of the children of israel, saying, god will surely visit you, and ye shall carry up my bones from hence.
target_text: sa cakava o joseva vei ra na luvei isireli me ra bubului ka vaka: "ni sa sikovi kemuni mai na kalou, mo ni qai kauta cake na suiqu ki kea. "

source_text: so joseph died, being an hundred and ten years old: and they embalmed him, and he was put in a coffin in egypt. for other languages please go to www. wordproject. org
target_text: sa mate o joseva ni sa yabaki dua na drau ka tini; era vakasuluma na yagona, ka, biuti koya tiko ena dua na kato ni mate mai ijipita. for other languages please go to www. wordproject. org
